title: Lingokids - Play and Learn
description:
THE INTERACTIVE APP FOR KIDS
Lingokids is the fun, safe, educational kids learning app that toddlers and children aged 2‚Äì8 love‚Äîand parents trust! Packed with over 3000 shows, songs, coloring games, cooking games, and interactive activities, it lets your child play, learn, and grow at their own pace. This is screen time for girls and boys you can feel good about.

LINGOKIDS NOW HAS DISNEY ACTIVITIES!
Your kid can now play brand-new Disney Mickey & Friends, Disney Moana and Disney Frozen-themed activities. All fun, all edutaining‚Äîand all on the Playlearning‚Ñ¢ app kids love! 
From math to literacy to creativity, help your kid practice at their own pace with activities featuring beloved Disney characters like Anna, Elsa and Olaf, Moana and Maui, and Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck and Goofy.
Because when activities are this edutaining, they become something your kid truly loves!

5 REASONS LINGOKIDS IS GUILT-FREE FOR FAMILIES
Made by parents & educators
Loved by toddlers, preschoolers, and elementary school kids
kidSAFE¬Æ certified & 100% ad-free
More than 30 global awards
Over 3000 fun kids games and activities to play!

INTERACTIVE ACTIVITIES
Your kids can explore over 3000 interactive games, coloring games, and toddler-friendly challenges covering 650+ learning objectives‚Äîall through play! Subjects include math, literacy, science, engineering, art, music, and more. Kids can move at their own pace through a curated curriculum using fun toddler games, books, videos, and songs. Perfect games for your 2,3,4,5,6,7,8 year olds!


PLAYLEARNING‚Ñ¢ METHOD
At Lingokids, we believe learning sticks when it‚Äôs wrapped in fun. Our Playlearning‚Ñ¢ method inspires toddlers and kids to discover the world naturally‚Äîthrough play, repetition, and curiosity. From coloring and games to movement, stories, and songs, every interaction builds real skills.

FEATURED BRANDS & CHARACTERS
Your kids can play with familiar favorites like Blippi and Pocoyo. Plus, brand-new activities featuring beloved Disney characters all available inside the Lingokids app. And discover activities created with trusted names like NASA and Oxford University Press.

Many families may already know Lingokids from our videos on YouTube and YouTube Kids, where over 3 million subscribers enjoy our playful, edutaining content. Now, those same kids can keep learning through fun toddler games and interactive activities inside the app.

SUBJECTS, THEMES & LEVELS THAT GROW WITH YOUR CHILD
Reading & Literacy: Build phonics, writing, and reading confidence.
Math & Engineering: Strengthen number sense, addition, subtraction, and logical thinking.
Science & Tech: Introduce biology, chemistry, coding, robotics and NASA-powered activities.
Music & Art: Play with rhythm, sound, and creativity in music + coloring games.
Social-Emotional Learning: Practice empathy, expression, and mindfulness.
History & Geography: Spark curiosity about the world and its stories.
Physical Activity: Fun stretches, yoga, and movement songs keep toddlers engaged!

WHY UPGRADE TO LINGOKIDS PLUS?
Unlimited access to 3000+ toddler games, coloring games, and activities
Covers 650+ learning goals across subjects and life skills
Expert-designed lessons for boys and girls aged 2‚Äì8
Lingokids activities featuring Disney, Blippi, Pocoyo, NASA and Oxford University Press content
Progress reports, parent community, and up to 4 child profiles
100% ad-free, with no in-app purchases
Play online or offline‚Äîanywhere, anytime!

Subscriptions automatically renew each month 24-hours before the end of the current period and your iTunes account will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew any time from within the app. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

Help & Support: https://help.lingokids.com/
Privacy Policy: https://lingokids.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://www.lingokids.com/tos

scraped_reviews.content: Poor user interface, navigation was nonsensical to me. In addition it's crazy expensive for what you get. If it was a one time fee of 5-10 dollars I'd pay it, but not 15/mo. Some of the "games" consisted of drawing one circle, and that was it. Some are 1min videos with a small song. To me it looks like padding content to try to justify the price.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We appreciate you time. We understand that our price may not suit many families. We invite you to email us at help.lingokids.com/hc/en/requests/new so we can look for something that might fit what you're looking for.üòâ We will be happy to help!

(If you already have modes for that, ignore this review.)

They offered a free months trial and then you start paying monthly. This is so fraudulent. I've asked for a refund. So guys be careful. Follow them up when they are deducting payments from your card.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nicolea. Please contact us right away at hello@lingokids.com so that we can help you! The free trial becomes a subscription if not canceled during the trial. Upon registration, we notify users of this date. We are so sorry for the trouble. We offer full refunds within 7 days if you need to cancel.

scraped_reviews.content: Vibrant and cute graphics, fun app for my kids but too expensive for a kids app in terms of content. Impossible to find the cancellation button to cancel trial in the app (and somewhere on their info page explicitly says u'll be charged the monthly fee if u don't cancel 2 days before trial ends) so I've cancelled my credit card instead and sent in a request to cancel my trial. U guys had many reviews about payments, so u guys can't keep saying u don't understand what that means.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello,. We are sorry that our price does not suit what you are looking for, you can also enjoy Lingokids for free, we apologize if you had problem to cancel. Please get in touch at help.lingokids.com/hc/requests/new and we'll fix your problem right away.

scraped_reviews.content: Best kids learning app by far!! My kids are developmentally delayed in speech/communication and although they didn't even get to use it the whole week of the free trial, they have gotten soo much from it. After a year of speech therapy this would be the perfect tool for continuing that progress. So many cute learning videos and games that teach drawing, writing, color and shape matching minigames etc. I'm so sad to remove but you can bet that when things pick back up I will DEFINITELY reinstall!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for sharing your storyüíó Since this is a public review, we are not able to see your email and contact you back for the gift.Can you please write us here: https://help.lingokids.com/hc/en/requests/new Please put Googleplay review "Summer Campbell" as subject and description, so we will be able to respond you on your personal email.

scraped_reviews.content: Did not use it, installed to have a look at the content and saw the high subscription cost which I can't justify... In terms of comparing the cost, I pay around the same for netflix which is used for at least 8-10 a day... This app is something id only like to allow my child on a hour at most so their not glued to technology all day. I would happily consider it if it was multi user so both parents can have it on their phone and if the cost was much lower.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We appreciate you sharing your feedback with us, we understand that our price may not suit many families. We invite you to email us at help.lingokids.com/hc/en/requests/new we'll look for something that fits what you're looking forüòâ. Have a great day!

scraped_reviews.content: My toddler and I love this app! We don't use any other kids apps for learning but this one. We can sing along, interact, practice reading and writing, earn sticker achievements, scroll through to pick our favourites and now play unlimited as we were just using it for the free play and were tired of waiting a whole day to play again! Highly recommend. My toddler has already learnt some new songs and has started number recognition at 2.5yrs. It's great learning time together.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Wow! We're so happy to hear that you and your toddler are having a fantastic time learning with Lingokids Unlimited! We hope that your toddler continues to have fun singing new songs, earning stickers, and practicing our number activities. üòä üìö

scraped_reviews.content: The offer for two month at 0.99 ‚Ç¨ price is a scam. You get the same as in the free trial, same limitations. It is not unlimited as the said in the offer. The price is pretty high 14.9‚Ç¨ but we considered to take it for one year due to the offer of two month at 0.99 ‚Ç¨. I lost 1 ‚Ç¨ because lingokids have not returned it, even if I claim it back withing 5 min after payment. But lingokids lost 140 as I will not take for year subscription. Don't take the 0,99‚Ç¨ offer even if that sound like cheap.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Livia, that's odd. üò¢ We'd suggest reaching out to our Customer Service team so they can review your account and look into what's happening üëâ help.lingokids.com/hc/en-us/requests/new üôè

title: Sleep Cycle: Sleep Tracker
description:
Relieve stress, sleep better and wake up rested. Sleep Cycle is your personal sleep tracker and smart alarm clock with a range of features (incl. snore recorder, sleep recorder and sleep sounds) to help you get a good night‚Äôs rest and wake up easier. You will be in a better mood, and feel recharged and focused during the day.

Get that slumber that will do wonders for your health. 72% of our users confirm their sleep quality has improved after using Sleep Cycle‚Äôs sleep tracker. 

‚è∞ 5 reasons you‚Äôll love Sleep Cycle:

1. A unique sleep tracker: No need to put your phone under your pillow. Just place your device on the nightstand or close by on the floor.
2. Gentle wake-up: Our smart alarm clock goes off at the ideal time for your body so you wake up rested and calm.
3. Tailored advice: We show you personalized tips to develop lasting habits that will help you achieve better sleep and feel great inside and out.
4. No more guessing: Control if you snore, talk, cough, or sneeze at night with our sleep recorder.
5. Fall asleep faster: Create the perfect bedtime conditions with meditation, sleep music, and sleep sounds, including rain sounds for better sleep and white noise. 

Powered by our patented AI technology, Sleep Cycle is an advanced sleep tracker for anyone seeking to prioritize their health, manage stress, recharge and get happier. Whether you aim to change your sleep habits, reach a regular sleep schedule, track your snoring, record your sounds at night or wake up more refreshed with a smart alarm clock, there‚Äôs a feature for you.  

‚≠êÔ∏è Top Sleep Cycle Features

SMART ALARM CLOCK
‚àö Its unique design wakes you up at the perfect moment ‚Äã‚Äãfor a refreshing start
‚àö Carefully selected alarm clock sounds
‚àö Customizable wake-up windows up to 90 minutes
‚àö Snooze by shaking or double-tapping the phone lightly

SLEEP RECORDER AND SNORE TRACKER
‚àö Snore recorder and sleep talk recorder: Snore tracker function to check how much you‚Äôre snoring.
‚àö Sleep recorder notifies you how external noises impact your sleep
‚àö Coughing: Track and compare your cough levels to make informed decisions for your health.
‚àö Who‚Äôs snoring? Know if it‚Äôs you or a partner snoring for better sleep analysis.

SLEEP TRACKER
‚àö The sleep tracker sees how well you slept with a quality rate score from 1 to 100.
‚àö Detailed reports: Statistics, trends and graphs.
‚àö Sleep notes: Monitor how drinking coffee or stress affects your rest.
‚àö Use the sleep tracker and see how your sleep affects your mood.

SLEEP MUSIC AND SLEEP SOUNDS
‚àö Library of sleep sounds designed to help you fall asleep faster
‚àö Sleep sounds: White noise, ASMR, green noise, pink noise and rain sounds
‚àö Guided meditation: Sleep meditation and meditation music
‚àö Sleep music and relaxing music for deep sleep
‚àö Bedtime stories: Sleep stories paired with sleep sounds that guide you into slumber

SLEEP PROGRAMS 
‚àö Learn how to improve your sleep with sleep guides made just for you by our sleep experts. Based on topics like stress relief, bedroom hacks or screen use. 

AVAILABLE ON WEAR OS
‚àö Keep your phone on the nightstand and use the sleep tracker from your watch
‚àö Gentle vibrations on your wrist
‚àö Quick summary of your last night‚Äôs sleep
‚àö Including tiles and complications for easier use

ALSO FEATURING:
‚àö Sleep games: Start your day with ‚ÄúAwake‚Äù, a sleep game that lets you test your alertness in the morning, helping improve your focus
‚àö Sleep Goal: Your sleep score and reminder towards a more regular and restful slumber
‚àö Online backup - secure your data online
‚àö Integration with Google Fit
‚Ä¶ and much more.

Get started with Sleep Cycle tonight - Falling asleep & waking up in the morning has never been easier with our sleep tracker and sleep sounds!

REQUIREMENTS
- Ability to charge your phone by the bed.
- Ability to place your phone near the bed, such as on a nightstand table or the floor.

Need help? https://support.sleepcycle.com/hc/en-us 
Terms and Privacy: https://www.sleepcycle.com/privacy-policy/

summary: Smart alarm clock & sleep recorder. Sleep sounds & white noise for better sleep

scraped_reviews.content: I paid for the yearly membership, hoping to get insights into my sleep. Not even 3 months in and I'm uninstalling the app. I wish I had NEVER done the annual subscription. Some features are cool, like the sound tracking for snores. But the app does not register that I'm waking up (even when choosing how I feel waking up) and it doesn't work correctly on my watch. It constantly overrides my home screen and shows the set alarm whenever I turn on my watch. Even during the day after I've woken up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Please reach out to us at Support@sleepcycle.com so we can take a closer look at this!

scraped_reviews.content: Overall the app is pretty great, even on the free version. I especially like that I can just tap my phone to snooze the alarm. The reason for four stars is sometimes the alarm doesn't sound at all. On those nights, it appears to not really track sleep either as the chart shows only a straight line across the bottom of the sleep graph. Not sure what's going on there. I always have a backup alarm set anyway but it's still frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! If your graph shows a straight line there is something disturbing the tracking! If you contact us at Support@sleepcycle.com we can help you take a closer look!

scraped_reviews.content: The app said I was coughing for 2 hours at night, and I wanted to listen to the recording, which was only available for premium. Since I was offered a free trial, I thought that if I signed up for premium and cancelled immediately I wouldn't be billed. Not only was I billed the monthly cost, BUT A YEARLY subscription. It was also very hard to cancel the plan. DO NOT GIVE THIS APP YOUR MONEY!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! If you forgot to cancel your trial here is some information on how to request a refund! https://support.sleepcycle.com/hc/en-us/articles/360008140193-How-do-I-claim-a-refund-

scraped_reviews.content: I signed up for the free week and didn't really like it too much. The fact that it wants 7 nights of data to know how you sleep ends up paying for a year subscription. I have tried to cancel the subscription so I would not get charged and still was charged. It does not show in Google Play under manage subscriptions to cancel at all. My watch and phone do really well with my sleeping without this, and I am afraid I am out of money for something I will not be using at all.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! If you forgot to cancel your trial here is some information on how to request a refund! https://support.sleepcycle.com/hc/en-us/articles/360008140193-How-do-I-claim-a-refund-

scraped_reviews.content: Overall, it's good, but it's not recording very accurately. For instance, I had a lot of phlegm last night; Sleep Cycle did not pick up any of me clearing my throat, several times. I was awake more than asleep! Also, there's no place to write my own notes -just words to describe the day before.

They don't offer monthly subscriptions and the app requires about 7 or more days to even know whether you want to keep it. It's not that great either. You can't even trim data... Even so, I wanted to try it out for longer than 7 days but an annual subscription is required. Bad business and they lost a potential customer. For the record, no app is good enough to require only annual subscriptions.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thank you for your feedback, we really appreciate it!

scraped_reviews.content: I have used this app a few times whenever my sleep schedule gets super messed up. The metrics it offers to gage your sleep are very helpful in identifying problems and crafting solutions. The app itself offers things like a dynamic alarm. I usually will use Sleep Cycle for a month or two until my sleep cycle has been corrected, and then leave it, but I can see it being a useful tool to use all the time. For me, it serves its purpose well as a machine of correction. Very cool and helpful!

10 years ago, when testing various sleep apps, I thought this was extremely basic. Well, it's good to see that they haven't changed: still as bare-bones as ever. I tried the Pro version for free, and it's worse than the built-in tracker on the phone. No Spotify integration is ridiculous, and yet not the worst: if you want snoring, you need to select microphone tracking ‚Äì meaning it will not use the watch accelerometer. Add the fact that it lacks any other data, and this app is a useless gimmick.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thank you so much for your feedback, we really appreciate it!

scraped_reviews.content: When it works, it works great, but it has a fatal glitch of sometimes it will stop functioning all together. Until you open the app again, meaning when the alarm is supposed to go off it doesn't and causes you to miss your wake-up time. I can no longer trust this app to function as my alarm and have chosen to use my phones baked in alarm now. I use a moto android as well. could be an issue with moto phones possibly, yet if you depend on your alarm to wake-upon time, I wouldn't trust it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! It sounds like there might be something disturbing the tracking here! If you contact us at Support@sleepcycle.com we can help you take a closer look at what might be causing this!

scraped_reviews.content: This app works great...most of the time. Occasionally this app will close itself in the middle of the night, thus canceling your alarm, and when you open the app again it panics and plays the ringer for the alarm immediately upon opening the app. This problem has made me late to many important events and I will be uninstalling this app. I would discourage you from installing this app as well, just use the clock app on your phone, its not as fancy but at least its reliable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! It sounds like there might be something disturbing the tracking here! If you contact us at Support@sleepcycle.com we can help you take a closer look at what might be causing this!

scraped_reviews.content: I've tried to use this app for the last 8 months and I've finally decided to cancel my subscription and remove this app from my phone. Sleep Cycle tries to do too much, in my opinion, and the level of integration between my Samsung phone and Galaxy watch was starting to NEGATIVELY affect my sleep. note to developers - i don't need your app to randomly turn on alarms to wake me up. I also don't need the app to constantly and erroneously detect when im sleeping. Waste of money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! This sounds strange, please reach out to us at Support@sleepcycle.com so we can take a closer look at this!

scraped_reviews.content: Update: as of about 2 weeks ago my snooze started playing a dripping water sound. It's like being in a cave. I hate it. I can't turn it off though because it doesn't exist in the settings. My wake up sound is "morning mist" but this is entirely different. Looking for new app. I've been using the free version for 3 or more years and love it. I like all the options for alarms and mostly love being able to confirm a good night sleep. or, know why I feel exhausted the next day. great sleep tracker!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We just released an update that fixes this issue, so if you simply update the app this will not be an issue anymore!

scraped_reviews.content: Great app overall. If it's able to detect noises and movement while you sleep, it should automatically end the sleep tracking once using phone or moving around. That would be an awesome feature. Also, a subscription is hard to justify when most of us have watches that can do the tracking and meditation apps that have sleep stories. Edit: down to one star because there is no "sensitivity" setting. I've been getting woken up as soon as my 30 min window starts even if I'm in deep sleep!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Please reach out to us at Support@sleepcycle.com so we can take a closer look at this!

scraped_reviews.content: So I've used this app daily since 2016, when it was 99 cents. It's typically great, but something with the latest update really screwed up the alarm. it no longer goes off, it will just vibrate twice and go back into snooze mode. I've had the alarm decide to go off 45 minutes after it was set. all the settings have remained the same, there is no wakeup window, volume is up etc...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Please reach out to us at Support@sleepcycle.com so we can take a closer look at this!

scraped_reviews.content: Love hate relationship. I sleep through all traditional alarms. For some reason, the smart alarm in this app wakes me up perfectly! So long as it actually works. I have to keep uninstalling and reinstalling just to get the gradual alarm to function. Which is dangerous because I never know when it's going to fail, and I wake up late. Instead of the gradual alarm softly getting louder until my actual wake-up time, it'll just ring at the time I set; no different than a regular alarm. Upsetting.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Please reach out to us at Support@sleepcycle.com so we can take a closer look at this!

scraped_reviews.content: Great app. It's nice that I can leave the phone on my night stand instead of my bed; does a good job of tracking deep sleep vs light sleep. PLEASE add an EDIT feature where I can change the time I went to bed or woke up. Sometimes I forget to end the tracking when I get out of bed since I'm still sleepy, and then an hour later I realize it's still tracking. It would be nice to delete that extra time and enter the correct wake time. EDIT: I would also like the option to edit how much sleep I got.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thank you so much for your suggestion and feedback, we really appreciate it and will take it into consideration for future development!

scraped_reviews.content: This is the second time in the past 10 days that I've had to uninstall this app because the alarm refuses to shut off. App crashes when I try to go into the journal to see how long it was actually tracking today since it won't shut the alarm off. I will not be reinstalling it a third time. Also, I paid for the premium content. I want my money back.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there!
Please contact support@sleepcycle.com with further information and we will assist you.
All the best, Nora

scraped_reviews.content: I have used Sleep Cycle since 2014. I even purchased the app (they have since switched to a monthly service fee and my purchase is no longer honored). Suddenly, about a month ago, Sleep Cycle started freezing when I try to open the app. Re-downloading the app fixes the freezing issue for a few days, then it starts freezing again. I love this app, it's too bad it no longer works.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! This sounds really strange, please contact us at support@sleepcycle.com so we can take a closer look at this!

scraped_reviews.content: What an interesting tool! I have been trying it out a little over a week. I notice my deep sleep cycles are in regular pattern. I know not to set alarm for 6 AM because I'll feel bad all day from getting jarred out of a deep sleep. If I would need to readjust my sleep schedule, I'm sure the app could help see the progress. On a side note, I do not have a nightstand. I use microphone mode with a TV & fan running. The app runs an hour before I sleep and has recorded that accurately.

Great App! Only thing I would like is to have to the ability to set up a schedule and have it automatically start tracking at a certain time. Some nights I forget to set it up before I go to sleep and I end up with no alarm in the morning. Also itd be nice for the alarm sound volume to slowly increase when the alarm goes off, so I'm not awaken startled up. Other than that, it's great!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thank you so much for your feedback and suggestions! We really appreciate it!

scraped_reviews.content: If you sign up for the "free" trial you'd better set a reminder for when it ends, because if you don't cancel it before the"free" trial ends, you'll get billed $29 for the first year without getting any warning or opportunity to change your mind. Also the app requires you to keep your phone plugged into your charger all night, which is terrible for your battery.

total gimmick. every night it said I was only snoring for about 2 - 3 minutes, but I know I snore a lot more than that. And you have to upgrade in order to listen to the recording. Then it tells me that I didn't move enough during the night to get an accurate reading.... so I slept too well? WTH!? Don't fall for this, it uses algorithms to ASSUME your sleep pattern.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there!
Please contact support@sleepcycle.com with further information and can look into this if you wish.
All the best, Nora

scraped_reviews.content: This app is changing my routine! In a week, I've been able to wake up 2+ hours earlier than normal and adjust fairly well. Waking up isn't nearly as painful, and for that, I am thankful!! My only complaint is how much they charge for the full version... $30/year is a bit ridiculous in my opinion. The free version will do for my purposes though.

This app does NOT track your sleep cycle like it proposes to do. It didn't seem correct, so I placed my phone in another room with the door closed one night and miraculously it still produced a whole sleep cycle graph the next day showing when I was asleep, awake and in my deep sleep. Fine to track when you go to sleep and wake up and to use as an alarm clock, but don't use it for anything else and think you're getting useful information.

To upgrage for more features you need to buy a subscription, which I get and is fair. However it says "Try it Free", implying a free trial period, but when I clicked on the button, the billing period starts the same day. This seems like its either a bug or false advertising. I'm happy and willing to pay but I need to get a sense of how it works first.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You're certainly entitled to a 7-day trial period free of charge. If this was not the case, then please email us at: support@sleepcycle.com. We'll do our best to help you from there!

scraped_reviews.content: Overpriced üëéfor what it does and price is way higher than other sleep apps in the playstore. Sleep Cycle Alarm used to cost $1 for the premium version and now price went up to $29 per year!!! The subscription price is a ripoff and the free version is useless. The point is seller became very greedy! Before: $1 for premium features lifetime. Now: $29 per year subscription üëé
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello again! Did you get in touch with us - as per our previous note? As an early paying adopter you are entitled to a lifetime subscription. Please get in touch with us at: support@sleepcycle.com and we will get this sorted for you. Thanks for reaching out.

scraped_reviews.content: Seems more a hassle. Apparently you have to hit start each night before bed in order for it to track & shuts off if you use phone during that time. I like how Samsung Health just automatically tracks. Only thing useful is I'm able to fast forward snore recordings, which I can't do w/Samsung, honestly, do I really care? It's only 30 seconds & I don't listen everyday anyway. Just doesn't seem like anything worth paying for. Maybe if there was at least a 30 day trial to see if it was worth it.

I was not able to access it at all. You are required to purchase up front. It states to have a premium plan but not that there is nothing offered free. Not even to determine if it is one that fits your needs. I detest false representations. If they had just said you had to pay, I would have been fine with it. I wonder if these who do this rate them as free so they can charge you for each service & therefore make more money than just charging for the app itself. Clever marketing but sneaky. üòà
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello and thanks for reaching out. Good news, you don‚Äôt have to pay nor subscribe, to
enjoy Sleep Cycle. The Free experience is complete on its own and contains the analysis,
and won‚Äôt require you to subscribe. We believe the free experience is complete on its own,
and a fine way to get to know what Sleep Cycle can offer.

scraped_reviews.content: Does not always work properly. Some nights it accurately detects when I am awake or asleep, but other nights, it does not detect when I get up to go to the bathroom. It often registers time awake as being asleep, even if I deliberately talk or make noise to alert the app that I am awake, and there is nothing wrong with the mic. I have always used the free version, but noticed they changed from 1-time purchase to subscription. Why would anyone want to pay a subscription for this type of app?

Tried the free trial and wasn't impressed. Received an email 3 days before the trial ended: "Your trial of Sleep Cycle Premium annual Subscription will end in 3 days. To continue your subscription when your trial ends, please upgrade to a paid plan. If you do not upgrade to a paid plan before your trial ends, your subscription will automatically expire." So I did nothing, assuming it would expire, but was then automatically charged 3 days later. It was complicated to get canceled and refunded.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We're really sorry about this! If you did not get your refund, please reach out to us at Support@sleepcycle.com with the GPA number from your receipt and we will help you with a refund!

scraped_reviews.content: This app used to be way better about calculating quality of sleep. It would take into account how often you woke up, etc. Now it is almost purely duration. If I sleep horribly, get up 4 times, but manage to keep the tracker on for 8 hours, I will get near 100%. Before, that would have given me 60-70%. I don't know why they changed it, but it's disappointing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thanks for your mail. We didn't change it, actually, so it sounds like something else is going on here. Please reach out to our support and we'll see if we can help, here at support@sleepcycle.com - thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Not entirely upfront about the auto-subscription. I've seen some other reviews on here saying similar things and the developers responding that this is made known from the outset. I can only speak for myself in that I do not recall receiving info about the auto-subscription when downloading or installing the app, nor was informed when the free trial period was about to end. That said, I wouldn't mind paying if the app actually helped the way it claims to, but I always feel MORE tired using it.

Serves me well, supplying a good estimate of how well I slept each night and helping me keeping track of things I think may affect my sleep. In the past I have used sleep aids, though in recent months I have mostly stopped using them. Great to have multiple modes - I almost always use the simple alarm, set to the time I want to wake up every morning, but occasionally I find it good to wake up within a half-hour range. Some day, it might be good to have a more advanced analysis of things that affect my sleep, taking into account the possible interactions of the factors. But anyone who's not a statistician will prefer what we currently have.

Could be a great app, but there's no functionality to change inaccuracies when they occur. The other day I woke up at 5:30, was out of the house by 6, and Sleep Cycle said I was asleep until 7:48, with recordings of "snoring" that were really just the sounds of me at work. When I emailed support, they said there's nothing they can do at this time. I paid for the premium subscription too, so it's unfortunate they can't make a simple update to improve the accuracy of your sleep statistics.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. We're sorry to hear that you have issues with our accuracy. Unless support didn't already mention it, it might be a good idea to turn off the alarm as you wake up, or Sleep Cycle will desperately try to make sense of what's going on. If that doesn't help, we're intrigued and wouldn't mind taking a closer look at this case, actually.

scraped_reviews.content: The weirdest thing about this app is that you cannot edit the start or stop time of a sleep entry. I missed the alarm today, it stopped playing sounds eventually, later I woke up on my own, and didn't realize it was still running until the afternoon. It recorded a 15 hour sleep and the only thing I could do about it was delete the entire entry. No way to slide it back to my actual wake up time.

A nice alarm that wakes me up when I'm the closest to being awake. It also tracks what goes on during the night. Example would be if I'm coughing or shoring the app will pick that up and tell me. Overall I would recommend this app to anyone who is tired of alarms that jolt you awake. Or have problems sleeping and want to figure out what happens when they sleep.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for this awesome review! Made our day to read the positive impact the app has had!

scraped_reviews.content: For being a paid service, I'm not impressed with the accuracy. Records time I spend actively using my phone as "being asleep," and regularly doesn't log times I know I was awake. Does not work well with external ambient noise machine - apparently there is an accelerometer option but there is no indication of that in the app unless you go looking for it. Additionally, sleep reporting to Google Fit is incorrect. Support team was unhelpful with this issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We're so sorry you had this experience! If you want to switch to the accelerometer you do that by going to profile > more > motion detection > accelerometer!

scraped_reviews.content: Deceptive paid app pretending to be a free app. It won't let you go past the subscription request page without entering credit card info. What a scam! *edited to respond to the developers' response: forcing us to hand over our credit card information is not what I would consider a free app. Just because you'd "like" it that doesn't make it right. Oh well, I ended up using a competitor's app anyway. They know that free means not asking for payment information.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd like our users to experience the full version to get a proper feel for all the features, so the app will take you directly to a trial, where you need to set up an account. You can cancel this trial within 7 days and then there will be the option to opt into a free version. For further questions, please email: support@sleepcycle.com. Thank you

scraped_reviews.content: I really like this app, but: 1) I often sleep in 2 phases 4-5h at night and 2-3h in the afternoon, and the app doesn't support that - second sleep erases any data from first and statistics show I slept 2 hours for a few days of week. 2) You can't change wake-up time when the alarm rings, there is a snooze button, but if you decide to stay in bed longer you need to turn it off and back on - and have the issue from point 1. It may be a pro for some who have trouble getting up, for me it's a con.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Unfortunately, we only support one session per day, so tracking more than once a day can disturb the statistics and can cause the previous session to be deleted. But thank you for your suggestions!

scraped_reviews.content: TLDR it doesn't work and it's super annoying to use Before you can do anything at all (or even see what the app can do), the app makes you sit through a slow, unskippable animation and then create an account. Once I got in, the UI was bad. You can't just set a bedtime by typing in a time. You have to drag a big wedge on a circle to pick a time, which makes it hard to select the time you want. Finally, after I managed to set a bedtime, the reminder didn't actually go off when I set it to.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Please reach out to us at Support@sleepcycle.com so we can take a closer look at this!

scraped_reviews.content: TL;DR: great concept, poor execution. The alarm is a fantastic alternative to the norm, and is the only thing I can trust to get me out of bed. Except for the countless times I have set an alarm only for the alarm to start 15 minutes after I had it set, or it doesn't give me the intermediary wake-up time I planned for. It's honestly crazy to me how I have had this app for over a year and still can't trust for certain that I will be woken up when I schedule. I have been late because of this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! This seems really strange, please reach out to us at Support@sleepcycle.com so we can take a closer look at this!

scraped_reviews.content: They provide approx 6 data points per night for free. Time to sleep, get up time, sleep duration, time to fall asleep, snooring, but to listen to snoring, you have to pay, but they will share your information with other sleep studies for free, just not you for free. You gave to pay to access the rest, even the help us test reported snooring is behind their pay wall. Deleting after 19 days using app, most of what I want is stuff they want me to pay for so not much point in keeping it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We're really sorry you feel this way but we totally understand where you are coming from. Just to be clear we do not keep your information if you have not given us your consent to do so! You select that under 'consent and privacy' within the app. But thank you so much for this feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: I can't believe I paid $30 for this. I must have been very sleep deprived. The App doesn't even know how to record what time it was turned on... I think all it does is hijack Samsung's collected data and add a bunch of "window dressing" nonsense (grandpa's words). It's frustrating to lie in bed unable to sleep for hours only to find the App said you fell asleep in 3 minutes. already un-subscribed. 355 days until my subscription expires. Wiser but $30 poorer.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We're so sorry you had this experience, there are some factors that may cause the app to not track correctly, such as other apps, storage, android battery settings, etc. We would really want to help you with this issue if you would be up for it, please contact us at support@sleepcycle.com!

scraped_reviews.content: I just used Sleep Cycle for the first time and it recorded my husband snoring all night.  I'm hoping they can soon work out the feature in the android version that can tell which one of us is snoring.  I don't think I do and I don't want his sounds to mess up how Sleep Cycle is recording the quality of my sleep.  Overall, I like the alarm and the variable snooze feature.  I really need a slow start in the morning, so I'm hoping this app helps me to move my bedtime backwards without making me too groggy.  Love how I can track how many hours of sleep I got.  I don't usually check the clock when I go to bed/get up.

There's not much I like about this app and it is so limited in what it shows you if you prefer not to do a 5-day trial that it's virtually worthless. It also was off compared to my Fitbit. My Fitbit and I have been together a very long time and I know it's accurate and simple things like time asleep are completely different between the two devices. Furthermore it kept saying I was talking in my sleep when it was listening to the included audiobook- audio clip included! Bad!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Please reach out to us at Support@sleepcycle.com so we can take a closer look at this!

scraped_reviews.content: it's a great app free version. 5 stars free, 3 if you pay for it. I paid for a yr, and am disappointed at the lack of sleep stories, meditations, hypnosis, etc available and am still using YouTube instead. I won't renew, but I will keep using the free version. I you need to track snoring, talking, etc, the recordings are helpful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thank you so much for your feedback, we really appreciate it!

scraped_reviews.content: Pretty inaccurate. Sometimes I'll be laying in bed reading because I can't sleep and it tracks me as sleeping, sometimes even deep sleep. It records my husband's snoring every single night, even when I'm awake and he is asleep. Finally, it doesn't actually track your sleep, only how long youre in bed based on when you manually start and stop app. If I hadn't already paid for the premium subscription I'd just uninstall it. Waste of money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear this. It sounds like there is an issue with the sleep detection and sleep tracking, and we'd appreciate the opportunity to fix this. Please do get in touch at: support@sleepcycle.com - we'd be happy to resolve any problems you have from there. Thanks for your patience.

scraped_reviews.content: So what is the point of this app? Downloaded to help keep track, you can literally only look at a chart that says when you are awake, but literally any reason I actually got the app I can't use unless I pay??? The app is not even worth the price to look at everything else. 30 bucks just to hear sounds, I'll just set up a recorder. Don't download this app unless you want to pay 30 bucks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear this. The free version of the app still includes the smart alarm, nightly graphs, sounds and weekly insights. If you need any help to get going on this, please email us at: support@sleepcycle.com. We're always happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: I find it inconsistent. More often than not, the alarm will go off towards the end of the Sleep Cycle rather than beginning making it difficult to gauge how and when to set the clock. Sometimes the snooze works and sometimes it does not. App is waaaay to expensive. Also, you cannot close the app after EACH USE unless you choose sad, neutral, or happy. Even if you shut off the phone in an attempt to bypass this nosey feature, it is right there when you turn the phone back on. Intrusive!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. We‚Äôre sorry but also interested in hearing about your mixed experience, and wouldn‚Äôt mind you reaching out to us at support@sleepcycle.com, where you can tell us more about it for the purpose of helping us improve. Thanks for reaching out and take care.

scraped_reviews.content: This alarm is good, it's made a few improvements since it's inception but is still missing a few features keeping it from being perfect. I would love the ability to have an auto alarm set so I don't forget about turning on the alarm, the ability to track waking times during the night (like getting up to go to the bathroom), and the ability to track naps as well as nightly sleep. The inclusion of these features would greatly help user experience.

title: LinkedIn Learning
description:
Achieve your next career goal with LinkedIn Learning‚Äîthe only skill development platform based on the real-time skill and career insights from LinkedIn.

With the LinkedIn Learning Android app, you can:
- Learn from industry experts on the most in-demand business, tech, and creative skills
- Get real-time advice with AI-powered coaching in your pocket
- Get personalized content recommendations based on your skills and goals
- Stay up-to-date on the latest skills with new courses added weekly
- Learn the way you want online or offline‚Äîwith bite-sized video, audio, or full course options
- Start learning a little bit every day with Daily
- Earn Professional Certificates and Continuing Education Credits
- Add certificates of completion to your LinkedIn profile 
- Learn in the language that's best for you, including English, German, French, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese, Portuguese, Dutch, Indonesian, Polish, Turkish, and Korean

Trending topics include:
- Artificial intelligence and generative AI
- Business productivity and software
- Cybersecurity
- Diversity, equity, and inclusion
- Leadership and management
- Software development

The LinkedIn Learning app is free to download. With a subscription, you can access our full library as well as LinkedIn Premium networking tools. 

If you choose to subscribe, your subscription will automatically renew until canceled and will charge your credit card. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your LinkedIn account.


LinkedIn is committed to making its products and features accessible. Please find our statements to support this commitment https://linkedin.com/accessibility/reports

LinkedIn privacy policy: https://linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy
LinkedIn terms of use: https://linkedin.com/legal/user-agreement

summary: Learn in-demand business, tech and creative skills from industry experts

scraped_reviews.content: Very frustrating, especially since I've paid for the premium service. Developers, please fix whatever is giving me way more spinny circle than watchable video. I've tried downloading the videos, I've switched the quality to medium. I have no problems with any other streaming video platform. I have limited time each day to watch these lessons and improve my skills. No time for spinning circle interruptions. Please fix it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to review the LinkedIn Learning app. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this. Can you try to uninstall and reinstall the app? We've found this works for most. If you're still seeing this issue, please email us at https://lnkd.in/gTDpRr6 and we will look into this further. -JC

scraped_reviews.content: They've included a larger number of courses that were on other learning platforms and rebranded them. The problem is so many are outdated or low quality. My biggest issue is the price isn't justified for the amount of high quality original content. I think you're way better off saving your money and looking for sales on individual courses in other platforms or wait until you have time to binge watch a bunch of courses and issue for just one month.

The videos are good and educational. The issue I have is that after a few lessons completed, I was no longer able to add a new skill or lesson to my profile. I reached out to tech support and appeared to receive a response from a bot. I was instructed to uninstall and reinstall the app to fix the problem and it didn't resolve the issue. When responding again about the unsatisfactory results, they closed the ticket.

I'm sorry that some of you didn't get what you needed from your courses, but I had a really great experience with both courses I signed with. The instructors, Dennis Taylor and Annyce Davis, were awesome. I was annoyed in the beginning that I couldn't find the transcripts right away and that they weren't uploaded for a while, but they eventually appeared. But the app experience was fine for me. I had more of an issue using the course on desktop.

After watching listening to a few courses, I've discovered that often times the app will at first register the completion of a particular portion of the course but then as I progress, the progress may be undone on one or multiple portions. I use this for recertification credits and this is really frustrating because I then have to replay parts I've already heard in order to get the appropriate credits.

Great application! Well worth the monthly fee! What you learn can improve your skills in many different areas in job related skills... and some in personal success and achievements too! What I learned in one course paid for the entire year service! All I do is, I use it to broadcast to my TV through Google Chrome. What I would like, however, if it would be back available on the Roku app as well as there is only a limited version available now, not the full version. Thank you...

Given a free course, and then being told there was a 24-hour limit to it (which no one would be able to complete) was a shifty way to get me to download the app. So, I instantly uninstalled it. For $25/mo, I highly recommend something like Treehouse and not an educational business model that's more interested in upselling you in a fairly dishonest way. If I could give it zero stars I would.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Steven - We appreciate you taking the time to review the LinkedIn Learning app, and we're sorry to hear of the frustration this has caused. We'll pass your comments upward to our team here. If there is any additional feedback you'd like to provide, please email us at https://lnkd.in/gTDpRr6. Thank you! -JC

scraped_reviews.content: It's not that bad. I like the app. However, every time I try to log in through the library, it says that my library doesn't have access... The library access I have takes me to 'Lynda' on desktop, but login in with that option it's almost impossible, specifically if I have LinkedIn installed and logged into my personal account. I have to delete the apps constantly and then re-download them, and that's really frustrating.

If you are looking for beginner, intermediate or continuation training on almost anything you can think of, this is the app to use. Each lesson is broken down into small blocks with quizzes, it is easy to follow along. I have found so many management training courses here where I can continue improving my skills as a manager, leader, and mentor at any career I choose.

Very poor mobile app experience, constantly restarts the course I'm on at a video earlier in the course that I'm not on (my progress never saved). This especially happens when I am switching between apps (taking notes, pausing video to quickly do something else, etc), then all my progress is completely forgotten and I'm sent to earlier (or to the very beginning) of the course. Very, very, very frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We appreciate you taking the time to review us. Can you uninstall and reinstall the app? We've found this often does the trick. If you are still experiencing, we are happy to take a closer look into this. Can you send the following to us: Your app version, phone model/version? Please send it here: https://lnkd.in/gu4upfkp, Thanks! -RC

scraped_reviews.content: Does not work at all. I have an account online all set up. I have tried to log in several times on this app. I copy and paste the email and password so I know they're correct. The app goes to an error screen that only says "Something broke. Looks like we've taken the wrong exit here." This happens if I log in with my LinkedIn or school account. The website is great. App is useless.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to review the LinkedIn Learning app. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this. Can you try to uninstall and reinstall the app? We've found this works for most. If you're still seeing this issue, please email us at https://lnkd.in/gTDpRr6 so we can look into this. -JC

scraped_reviews.content: The app has several minor bugs but is an overall great companion to the desktop. Examples of bugs: When a question is incorrect it gives you the option to re-watch a video but clicking re-watch forces the device to switch and lock in portrait mode. Exams are extremely frustrating because there are 3 fixed banners that take up the majority of the screen and cannot be dismissed. One of those banners is a link to download the app that appears even while using the app, it cannot be dismissed.

changed from full screen mode to vertical to do a coding challenge for my course, but app got stuck in an infinite loop of redirecting me to the site, which redirects me back to the app, over and over. tried restarting the app but the same issue is happening. edit: tried this again in both vertical and horizontal mode, and same issue for both. seems this error is happening for the app in general

LinkedIn Learning is an amazing app for upgrading skills! The video courses are high-quality, industry-relevant and explained in a very simple way. The interface is clean and easy to navigate. I love how it tracks my progress and gives personalized recommendations. Perfect for professionals and students both. Highly recommended for continuous learning and career growth! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Look at my story: I can login with the browser not with this app. when I try login by Chrome or ... no problem it's okay I have access to all videos but when I try with this app it says "Your library doesn‚Äôt have access" yes I contacted my library they spent more than 100 min and finally told me there is no issue with ur library card problem is from app. I cleaned the cache of app, restarted phone, tried with other phone and .... still I can't login with library card.

Amazing content.. But the app however has some glitch when I switch orientation from portrait to landscape. It takes me to another video. I don't know why that is happening and it's kind of annoying. But I still use it because of the amazing content it has to offer. Please look into this LinkedIn team..

Doesn't work. I'm in a new college and the app won't let me log in as it keeps attempting to verify my new email address with my old college, even with all of my info updated in the settings and my old college email removed. This is a huge oversight in the app design. I contacted customer support but I believe the response came from AI, not a human. This is because they only gave generic copy/pasted responses which weren't relevant to my issue.

This app is often extremely ineffective and frustrating. It constantly buffers, even on a strong wifi signal, and will often say that it is not connected to the internet while you are actively watching videos. the videos won't register as completed until it decides you have internet, which makes it very difficult to track what you have and haven't finished.

Gosh, the frustration with this app makes me want to scream. You have something so useful but it is such a bloody nuisance to use. I cannot: - find ANYTHING! - download exercise files to my phone. What century are you in LI?!

The course helped me understand the importance emotional intelligence in leadership and provided practical tools to improve self-awareness, empathy, and communication. I would highly recommend this course to anyone looking to improve their leadership skills and emotional intelligence. It's a valuable investment for personal and professional growth.

Excellent Platform for Skill Development and Career Growth Review: LinkedIn Learning is one of the most effective and professional platforms for continuous learning. I‚Äôve completed several courses here, combining both theoretical study and practical practice on my laptop. The instructors are highly knowledgeable, and the content is well-structured, easy to follow, and industry-relevant. This platform has helped me upgrade my technical and professional skills, making me more confident and job
Video buffering issue even if we have a good internet connection. I have noticed this issue both on the website and mobile app.

a great app for learning varieties of courses and the videos are broken down into phases and short clips you can understand and won't wear you down, but after i reinstalled the app i couldn't access my previous profiles, lost all saved and downloaded courses, it's quite painful, i have tried recovering, keeps redirecting me to reconfirm am not a robot.

This class taught me a new way of thinking that I hadn't considered before. What I learned could help me in two ways: writing better prompts for AI and communicating more clearly with people. Now, I need to practice using these new skills. Thank you for putting this class together.

Samsung S23 Ultra 5G - app doesn't work. The app opens and then asks me to sign in. I enter my credentials correctly and the browser/app moves through the next page, which is blank white. Nothing else further happens after this. It doesn't matter if I use my personal or organisation credentials, the result is the same.
Active listening is so important to know about customer choices,their experience . Knowing and listening to people really helps us to get better results in business, maintaining good relations.
I can't watch daily videos bcz daily feature is totally blank. there is no video in daily feature.

The perfect App. I am so happy I can be at work and still be able to listen to great lessons and get new skills, even when my screen is off. I'm happy I didn't have to subscribe to Premium to have a background play.
Very useful platform for learning new skills. Highly recommended.

Oddly long loading times. Curiously, the videos load faster in the LinkedIn app than in this app that's supposed to be "faster". I don't have the patience to wait for buffering since almost all video apps load the contents instantly (as long as your internet is fast enough). It's really not an incentive to pay for courses if you spend so much time waiting to see the next video. Edit: This is still a problem, but it looks like the time went down a bit.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to review the LinkedIn Learning app. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this. Can you try to uninstall and reinstall the app? We've found this works for most. If you're still seeing this issue, please email us at https://lnkd.in/gTDpRr6 so we can look into this.

scraped_reviews.content: Absolutely worthless app. The videos dont play after you have subscribed and paid. They only put you on fast servers while you are on a trial period. Once the 1st payment is done, thats it! You are downgraded. Keep changing browsers nothing will improve. Worthless customer care executive only have chat bot type responses with them.

Too slow on mobile. Keeps pausing even with medium download quality. None of the other online video playing apps or learning apps show this kind of bad behavior. Internet speed is 300 Mbps. I am the only person using the internet.

Edit:- ISSUE RESOLVED : All you have to to is change the 'date & time' setting in your phone to Automatic . Don't know why !! I love LinkedIn learning. The problem is that a month ago or so, the app just stopped working on my phone (POCO F1) for no reason at all. Since then I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app multiple times ,to no luck. My next best option is to factory reset the phone, which I don't think is the right thing to fo for just one app to run on my phone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to review the LinkedIn Learning app. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this and would like to have our team look into it. Please email us at https://lnkd.in/gTDpRr6 and include a screenshot if possible, and we will be in touch with you soon. -JC

scraped_reviews.content: Why not a just rotate screen automatic when user make video to full screen. Or can't you just add a rotate screen button in video. Or just turn on auto rotate explicitly for this app. Why do I have to turn on auto rotate setting from my phone always. Linked learning is all about learning by watching video then why not focus little on user experience of area where user going to stay on 90% of time.

if the team developing this app were using it, it would not be like this. No kidding, * you can not even watch a video in full screen. * You can not open a course to read the content without having the video to start. I do not care to start a video and get it in my "in progress" if I'm not interested by the content. * you can no do some sport and listen to the content like a podcast without being blocked by test. Why isn't there any timeout. after 30s continue to play...

decent app, but the fact that we cannot see progress and which videos have been completed makes it practically useless especially when wanting to resume a course. If you re-install the app progress is shown, but then it disappears again.

The app does not allow me to login. It always asks me for my email and password which I used to register for the LinkedIn app then it will take me through a verification process then it will say invalid no CAPTCHA response then tell me that my email is not available on LinkedIn of which I am already having an account on LinkedIn with the same email sometimes it will say wrong password even if I input the right password I am fed up of it already

The app is not working properly. I have finished a course and it won't allow me to download the certificate. It says I haven't seen all the videos, even though they all had a tick. I saw that the status of two went 'unseen', so I started rewatching them. Then suddenly many other randomly went to 'unseen' status, even though I watched many twice. This randomness makes me think that the app has an important bug. I will not consider subscribing and paying for something that is not working well.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to review the LinkedIn Learning app. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this. Please email us at https://lnkd.in/gTDpRr6 and include a screenshot of what you're seeing, and we will look into this further. -JC

scraped_reviews.content: LinkedIn learning is really loaded with informative and insightful courses. It is not just about the certification but the robust courses embedded for real-time experiences. Though, there are certificates for each course taken.

First of all, a very great app!! Above all, take advantage of the option to save on the go (airplane mode can then be activated so there are no distractions). -- Feedback: it would be very nice if there was a dark mode (both for the app and for the desktop). In the interests of successful communication with each other, it would also be nice if there was a function that could translate comments in a language that I don't know. It would be exciting to see what other course participants think (
I haven't been able to log in. Its says my nocaptcha user response code is missing or invalid. 2/9/25 Still unable to log in. Its still the same challenge. its super annoying!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate you taking the time to leave a review. Can you uninstall and reinstall the app? We've found this often does the trick. If you are still experiencing the same, we'd be happy to take a closer look into this. Can you send the following to us: Your app version, phone model/version. Please send it here: https://lnkd.in/gu4upfkp Thanks! -NV

scraped_reviews.content: I love the app, it offers great flexibility to keep learning when you don't have easy access to your laptop. Being able to turn off the video and using the "only audio" option is very useful to when your internet connection is not that good or when you can't focus on the visual input (so kind of like a podcast). It's also great to be able to do the quizzes on the app, although would be better if all possible answers were already shown at the same time and I didn't have to swipe through them.
LinkedIn learning is the best academic hub I have ever come across I love the way everything is structured and the qualities of the courses.

Unfortunately, I cannot give 5 stars. I really like the content, however, I constantly encounter loss of progress on courses - that is, I can go most of a course, and then return to the app and see that I didn‚Äôt pass it, only quizzes remain passed. I completely erased the app data, but this is repeated again and again. Also, this problem can arise if you look at part of the course on a mobile device, and then continue to view it on PC - your progress on the course will be lost.
this is a great learning app especially for confidence in speaking in front of people and in general confidence building.

Was working perfectly up till about 3-4 weeks ago. I listen to the courses in audio only mode, while my phone is in my pocket. A few weeks ago there was an update ... now most of the time the app is not able to jump to the next lecture, sometime just stops until I manually push it, sometimes jumps back 2 lectures, might repeat first minute 3*. When I open up the cover, sometimes it shows all videos completed, sometimes all are in progress, sometimes all but the last 2-3 are unwatched.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for leaving a review. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this. Can you try to uninstall and reinstall the app? We've found this works for most. If you're still seeing this issue, please email us at https://lnkd.in/gTDpRr6 and we will look into this further. -JC

scraped_reviews.content: Doesn't save progress that you do, when watching downloaded courses offline. Watched a full course, but when I connected, all the progress that I had disappeared. Luckily it's only one course, so it's not a big problem, but would have made it difficult, if it had been weeks of watching offline during a vacation or if I wanted to keep the LinkedIn profile updated.
Loving its vast video collection so much variety for the examiner of thing and the curious.
after playing a video, it's not marked as green tick in left.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to review the LinkedIn Learning app. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing an issue logging in. If you're still seeing this issue, please email us at https://lnkd.in/gTDpRr6 and we will look into it. -JC

scraped_reviews.content: Their content is not very good compared to platforms like Udemy. Every course look like a corporate training video. On the other hand, the app is glorious. It plays on the background, it gives you the possibility to only load the audio, it doesn't reload when you minimize and come back. *Chef's kiss*. Please add some options for speeds faster than 2x.

title: Cheap Flights App - FareFirst
description:
FareFirst app helps you to find the cheapest flights and best hotel booking deals. With our real-time flight tracker feature, you‚Äôll always have the latest updates about your itinerary. Search 500+ travel websites instantly for the best price.
	
	We search and compare thousands of trusted travel sites with one click and help you to find the best flight tickets and hotel rooms. Our verified 1000s of online travel agencies and airlines are at your disposal to cover your travel needs throughout the world. We cover both domestic and international markets to find the hottest deals, cheap flights, even last minute flight booking deals and discounts. Our specialized and optimized search engine ensures that you always get the best deals and helps to make your travel more comfortable, stress-free, and pocket-friendly. Apart from travel agencies we also have tie-ups with many low-cost budget airlines to find airfare from airlines‚Äô websites directly. We also provide you with the best offers, deals, and discounts on hotel booking. Here you can find the best price hotel, motel, BnBs, vacation rentals, guesthouses, hostels, luxury resorts and more.
	
	Some of the popular agencies we compare are Cheaptickets, Expedia, FlightNetwork, Tripsta, Smartfares, Travelgenio, Momondo, Kayak, Kiwi, Opodo, Orbitz, Kupibilet, ihg, and many more.
	
	Popular airlines included in our search results are Alaska Airlines, Delta Air Lines, SkyWest Airlines, Spirit Airlines, ExpressJet Airlines, Hawaiian Airlines, United Airlines, JetBlue, Southwest Airlines, American Airlines, Envoy Air, Frontier Airlines, and many more.
	
	
	
	
	Why you should book with FareFirst?
	
	‚Ä¢ Comprehensive flight meta-search engine: Our search engine compares 1000s of airlines and many online travel agencies to get you the best and the lowest airline ticket available on the internet at any given moment.
	
	‚Ä¢ Exhaustive hotel results: Compare all the top travel sites with just one search to find the best hotel deals at FareFirst travel booking app - awarded the world‚Äôs best hotel booking site.
	
	‚Ä¢ Multi-City travel: Save time while planning to fly between multiple cities. Enter your cities and dates, allow us to do the heavy lifting.
	
	‚Ä¢ Nomad: Helps you find the best dates to travel for a series of destinations of your choice, customize every aspect of your travel needs with this unique and revolutionary feature.
	
	‚Ä¢ Advanced filter option: Find your preferred deals easily through our advanced filter option where you can precisely tweak your time, budget, carriers and many more requirements.
	
	
	
	‚Ä¢ No commission: We charge you zero commission or convenience fee ever. The prices you see in the results are the final prices without any hidden additional fees.
	
	‚Ä¢ 24x7 Customer support: You are important, in case you face any challenges or need any assistance, we are always there to help you via live chat, email, and ticket support. So go ahead and enjoy the best search results and find the cheapest booking prices without any worry, we are always around to assist you in case you need any help.
	
	Save your time and money by using FareFirst for booking flights and hotels on your next trip. We are the best flight finders online
	
	Disclaimer: FareFirst helps you to find cheap flights. We don‚Äôt sell airline tickets directly. We facilitate your search by going through thousands of OTA, airline, hotel, and travel websites and help you provide cheap flight and hotel booking.

On the way back I had to fly standby which sucked but luckily they found me a seat on both flights back to Maryland. The only reason I didn't give the app 5 stars is because some of the sites they redirect you to seem sketchy.

title: Sudoku.com - Classic Sudoku
description:
Sudoku free puzzle is a popular classic number game to train your brain. Solve daily sudoku and have fun! Thousands of number games to explore. Install the sudoku free app to start now!

Classic sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep your mind active ‚Äì pass the time in a pleasant way with sudoku free puzzle game! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head! Take your favorite number game with you wherever you go. Sudoku is available offline. Playing this free sudoku puzzle on mobile is as good as using a real pencil and paper.

Sudoku.com has 10,000+ classic number games and comes in six difficulty levels: fast, easy sudoku, medium, hard sudoku, expert, and giant! Play easy sudoku to exercise your brain, logical thinking, and memory, or try medium and hard sudoku to give your mind a real workout.

Our free sudoku puzzle games have some features that make this number puzzle easier for you: hints, auto-check, and highlight duplicates. What's more, in our app each classic sudoku puzzle game has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are solving your first sudoku puzzle, or you've progressed to expert difficulty. Choose any level you like!

Features:

‚úì Complete Daily Sudoku Challenges to get unique trophies
‚úì Take part in Seasonal Events and win unique medals by solving sudoku puzzles
‚úì Challenge yourself by figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
‚úì Turn on Notes ‚úç to make notes like you would on paper. Each time you fill in a cell on the sudoku puzzle grid, your notes are automatically updated!
‚úì Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column, and block
‚úì Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck on sudoku free puzzles

More features:

- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level of sudoku puzzle: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Or accidentally have the same numbers match in a row while solving a sudoku puzzle game? Just undo it quickly!
- Auto-save. If you leave a game with numbers unfinished, it will be saved. Continue playing your sudoku puzzle game anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column, and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of the mistakes in the free sudoku games

Highlights:

‚Ä¢ More than 10,000 classic well-formed sudoku puzzle games with numbers
‚Ä¢ 9x9 grid
‚Ä¢ 6 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty. This free sudoku puzzle is suitable for both sudoku beginners and advanced evil sudoku players! Play fast, easy and medium levels to exercise your brain. Choose hard sudoku to improve your skills and try an expert or giant puzzle with numbers for evil challenges.
‚Ä¢ Supports both phones and tablets
‚Ä¢ Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
‚Ä¢ Simple and intuitive design

Daily sudoku is the best way to start your day! 1 or 2 classic sudoku puzzles will help you to wake up, make your brain work, and help you to be ready for a productive working day. Download this classic number game and play sudoku free puzzles offline.

summary: Sudoku is a number game with daily puzzles for training your brain and logic!

scraped_reviews.content: Gameplay is fine, and they have plenty of challenging puzzles. The game loses stars due to occasionally interrupting gameplay for ads. I understand that the developers make money from ads, and having one pop up at the beginning or end (but not both) of a game is fine. Making you stop playing, usually disrupting concentration and flow, is not acceptable. I guess I have to continue my search for a good Sudoku game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mark! Thank you for sharing your thoughts. We recognise that in-game ads can be disruptive. Balancing ads and gameplay is our key focus, and your feedback is invaluable in helping us enhance the experience.

scraped_reviews.content: The game itself is fine as far as Sudoku goes, but you get interrupted with ads constantly as a "reward" when you clear a digit. Not only are the ads long and pervasive, but according to my carrier the app used over 400MB of data in just 3 days, presumably from those ads. That is simply unacceptable if you don't have unlimited data (which until 3 days ago, I didn't, and explains why my bill was so high until switching plans). last I looked it was $10 to remove ads, now it's $15. Crazy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for your feedback. We hear your concerns about the number of ads and the cost of ad removal. Your suggestions are important to us, and we‚Äôll keep them in mind while working on updates to improve gameplay. We‚Äôre grateful for your support and want to make the game better for you.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this and play it almost daily! It has several options - daily puzzles, choose puzzles at your particular level, larger and more complicated puzzles, and competitions. Whatever kind of player you are, you will find what you want here. But where is dark mode?! The white background is just too overpowering at night, even with my blue light / nighttime filters. Honestly, it's a bit ridiculous that an app that is mainly black and white doesn't have any sort of night mode.

It pains me to write this review. I have downloaded this game and the sister app Killer Sudoku on my various phones throughout the years. This last phone, I got tired of the ads (there are so many) and paid for no ads. Happy for a couple of years. I just did my phone upgrade and I'm now finding out that my $15 charge does not transfer! Now on the hunt for a Sudoku app that I guess has login access so my purchases can transfer. It's not only the purchase, it's my progress too. üôÅ
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Ashley! Thank you for your feedback! While the synchronisation feature isn't currently available, we recognise its potential. Please reach out through the "Help" section in the app, and we will assist you with the in-app restore purchase.

scraped_reviews.content: loved this app. I've placed in the top ten in tournaments several times. I never write reviews for these things either, so please take this seriously... the advertising has become FAR to aggressive, to the point of being unplayable. At first it was disruptive to concentration, now it's full on to much. The ad forces you into the play store. The only option is back out of the game entirely and restart it. Ridiculous!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your feedback. We're actively enhancing the balance between ads and user experience. User safety is our top priority, and we take ad issues seriously. Since third-party networks manage ads, please report any redirects through the ‚ÄúHelp‚Äù section in the app for a quick resolution.

scraped_reviews.content: I have loved this game for over 6 years playing every day. but the ads have gotten unbearable. They come up in excessive numbers and cannot be closed. Playing a game, I got an ad after every number I completed. it was the same one with a "Close" at the bottom. It never worked. I always had to wait a certain amount of time and then use my back button. Extremely frustrating. Uninstalling it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We're sorry to hear that you can't enjoy the game anymore. Rest assured, your complaint won't go unnoticed. We'll try to strike a better balance between ads and gaming. After a few seconds from the beginning of a video ad, an option to skip the ad must appear. If there's no such button, please contact us via the "Help" in the app.

scraped_reviews.content: The ads are too intrusive and impossible to escape from. They force interaction and sometimes play for excessive times. I originally rated this a three but changed review to a 1 star because I am almost to the last difficulty level because it still isn't challenging to solve a puzzle. It's too easy! And by design so that they can shove more ads down your throat.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your feedback. We acknowledge that the ad experience has been overwhelming and impacted your enjoyment. We're actively working on finding a better balance. We also appreciate your input regarding the game's challenge level. If you have any further questions or suggestions, please contact us through the "Help" section in the app.

scraped_reviews.content: I understand the need for ads to pay for this game but can't they be relegated to before a puzzle starts or after a puzzle is completed?
