descriptionHTML:
The MSN app keeps you informed, productive, and entertained with tailored content, real-time weather, stock tracking, short videos and more.‚Äã
‚Äã
Key features‚Äã

Your tailored feed, with you on the go.
Quality content from thousands of trusted publishers.‚Äã‚Äã

Weather report‚Äã
Get hourly and 10-day forecasts, air quality, UV index and more.‚Äã

Financial news‚Äã hub‚Äã
See the latest on the market, trends and your favorite stocks. ‚Äã

Your personalized video feed‚Äã‚Äã
Scroll short clips of the latest news, trending stories and viral moments. ‚Äã
summary: Welcome to the MSN app! Your tailored feed, with you on the go.

scraped_reviews.content: I like the varied news sources with the MSN app, but with Microsoft being in the top 3 of the I.T. game, you'd think they would figure out how to get the correct video to play when you tap on you want to watch from the home page. Plus, it seems that half of the stories on the homepage are videos that you cannot access. I've left feedback twice re this and nothing changes. Will probably uninstall and go to another news app, again!

When you choose to watch any videos that are offered in the stream, you're not gonna get the ones that you choose. MSN will give you everyone, but the one that you wanted. There's nothing that I have found that cures the this problem. Another problem is the sighing in problem, you have to sign in repeatedly!!! This app doesn't deserve a signal one for a rating.

Miserable and frustrating scrolling. Most of the content is stuff like "The 15 best xxx". I'm interested in these lists, but you can't read them because scrolling down, about half way, the app goes to the next article, not the next item on the list. It also unexpectedly pops up a blank page destroying your scrolling position at random. Also, the ads presented are all suspicious and scammy. Woe to you if you inadvertently click on an ad! You would think Microsoft could do better all around.

Reading news with this app on my heavy tablet is a horrible experience. It doesn't support landscape mode. I often will be reading an article and when I scroll near the end, it jumps to a new article when I might not have finished reading the last couple paragraphs, and I can't find my way back. The news feed often has scrolling issues, too. And it has way more ads than other news readers. I'm shocked that this is made by Microsoft.

I only downloaded this for the "deals" section. Not sure what the point of the rest of the app is since it's basic stuff you could do with things that come pre-downloaded on a phone, but whatever. Anyways, the deals section barely works. Half the time you can't scan a receipt. I had a special gas deal not go through, put in a ticket, and never got a response back. I waited over a month. Just awful. Definitely not worth the few pennies you get back. There are definitely better apps for that.

The most comprehensive news app I've found, and the dark mode is essential. I won't use a news app without it. Use it on my laptops too. Even has comics, like a real newspaper. BUT it has a basic problem: it responds poorly to touch! I often have to tap several times to get an item to open, sometimes I have to press and hold, sometimes things won't open at all. It's very inconsistent, and it's not my phone, every other app works fine. You'd think this is like Coding 101 for a touch screen app.

Frustrating app that has gone through many changes lately. You have categories for a reason, yet 1/2 the content in a category doesn't belong. Take for example "NFL", a large portion of the stories are college, a shooting near a high school, and high school. Some articles are not articles and instead links to some random podcast. Other articles track how often you view the sources content and then cuts you off. I'm finding myself using this app less and less because of those three reasons.

They trick you into installing the app with a promise of 1000 Rewards Points, but then don't give you the points. This is happening to many people. Customer support asks for information and proof, then finally responds with a irrelevant email saying they had a conversation with you, that you made purchase, and they will refund it. No conversation, no purchase, what is there to refund? They cheat you.

Customization is nearly nonexistent. I turn off every news feed check box and my news feed is still full of articles... Imagine that. I have an rss link and there's no way to enter it. In other words, you get what their useless algorithms give you and nothing more. Algorithms are the bane of useful information on the internet. Y'know, cuz if our algorithm doesn't think you need it, then you don't!

Edit 3/28/24 The app still sucks, won't open stories and kicks you out if you try to read too many comments. And the website is back to forcing you onto the app to read any content. Would rate zero stars. If you're going to force people on to the app in order to read the stories from your website, at least make the app WORK. It closes every time I try to read the comments and in general if I'm on it for more than 5 minutes.

Was great, now it's terrible. Before they recently "improved" the app, I could see multiple articles at one time, like opening a newspaper, and I could quickly scan the page for articles that interested me. Now I'm forced to scan down a single column of their choosing. And yes, I've changed the view format (only 3 options) and all are equally as bad. I'm searching for a replacement.

Learning to use this app at first was a struggle, just so much useless stuff in one app and trying to find where to go to scan the receipt was like finding a needle in a hay stack. Its location is constantly changing. Sometimes, it's on the banner when you first open the app, and sometimes it's not. While using the camera to scan, the camera within the app slows down to about 1 frame per 5 mintues, making it extremely difficult to use, have a brand new S23, and the app has remained updated...

The whole reason i downloaded this app was the cashback on receipts offer, but it appears that they have removed a guaranteed payout on any receipts, making the function essentially just a way to collect information without compensating. If the system worked correctly more often and always credited for the deals shown, it would not matter, but with no guarantee of getting anything anymore, it has become little more than data collection. Edit: February 22, 2024: They don't pay on receipts anymore

I was really hopeful to use this application since I have been a Microsoft user for ages. However, the lack of any functioning features, including the feed, the slow response, and the lag in this app, is unbearable. If you ever have the fortune to even see anything, and it provides you with anything, which it never does.

This used to be a fun app in which you could collect points to get a simple gift card. Now it's going dystopian on me and the algorithm is not allowing me to redeem my points and yes I have plenty of points to use. 3 times I contact customer support and nothing resolved. I try again and now they won't even let me submit my issue. They definitely have major glitch issues in their news articles as well. Somebody at Microsoft if you see this...do something instead of sipping on Starbucks all day.

This year (2025) Microsoft somehow loused up the links to video articles so that you never get the correct video news article that you select. There's no point in even clicking on a video article headline as you will be directed to a completely unrelated story. I'll upgrade my rating if they ever fix this.

As mentioned by other reviewers the links aren't going to the correct story. BUT very frustrating that the rewards aren't working for over a week I haven't been able to do daily checkins. I open the app and it shows up for a second then disappears and can't get help from app support. This is even after app updates. Please fix the app!!

Needs Work. A lot of work. First, when there is a video you want to watch, you select it and then the another video comes up and they force you to scroll through many, many videos to try to find the one you wanted in the first place. Second, every one is segmented by several ads. What a time suck! This is their attempt to compete with Tik Tok and gives you ADD. Suffice it to say, I would expect so much more from Microsoft. This app really sucks and gets worse with each update.

It was an ok app until it wasn't. When I click on a news story with video, it takes me to the wrong video. I've tried reinstalling 3 times now. it's not solving it. My other issue is that if I make comments, I don't see anywhere on the app in which I can read responses to my comments.

I thought it's a news, weather and feeds update app to update us letting us know what's happening in the world also with prefered topics but it's also a browser short of which I don't like come on Microsoft you are pushing bing everywhere I know bing is a good search engine but I also has a seperate app so why putting it here too ( main reason of 3 star) bulky app

No personalized content, No way to manage sources or topics. No Local news option anymore. Latest update does not prevent videos from automatic start. Articles scroll too fast. too much video content. The constant auto rotation can not be slowed or paused. Too much horizontal scrolling to view headlines. Better off just using a web browser. Just bookmark your news feed web page using Edge (Chrome wont work :( when try to read articles). getting worse with updates.

I use the news aggregate every day. While I still get topics and news sources that I have no interest in, on a whole, it is very useful. However, recently, when I click on a video story, it does not bring up the correct story. It is always an old, totally unrelated video. Please fix!

I use to like reading anything in the news on MSN. not any more. so many times I see an article or video I want to learn more about and instead of the actual article I clicked on a video pops up from CBC News I try again this time a video of global news story. yet can get American news and Canadian news fine but when is from a different News report I click on the picture takes me to CBC News I click on the description takes me to global news. this is more than frustrating it is sad.

Video links in the apps (Bing, MSN, and Edge) take you to completely unrelated videos. Microsoft needs to fix all of its apps that do this. The bug is on the developer side. People are getting frustrated that they can't view the video they're expecting.

app recently stopped playing the correct video in news section. You can click on a video headline but it willl never take you to the correct video. I only got the app because the website version became unusable on a phone. Time to give up here and find a new news app

Can't get reward points. Get banned from gaining points for searching like you would on Google. They are pausing, banning, and limiting people because they can, and not because you are breaking rules. Bing is a terrible search engine, and everyone knows it. They don't want you redeeming rewards, so they do everything they can to block you from gaining points, and if it means lying and falsely banning you, thats what they will do.

Will this app ever work properly? There is a setting in SEARCH called IMAGE FEED PERSONALISATION, when the toggle is set to OFF, it will automatically switch to ON if you leave settings then go back and check it. Basically it can never be set to OFF???

EVERY TIME, I RESET LOCATION TO MY DEFAULT, YOU RESET LOCATION TO WASHINGTON. ONE STAR, I DON'T NEED WEATHER NOTIFICATION FOR WASHINGTON. NOTIFICATIONS GOING OFF FOR GOOD. STOP DISRESPECTING YOUR USERS. Gave up and uninstalled. You treat us like trash. I need to Verify...to earn what measly few points you'll give me for a couple of mobile searches. Nope.
Links don't seem to work for some videos, if something seems interesting on my feed I click it and it brings me to an unrelated video. seems like a basic feature
Cannot clear cache to restore my account properly. Keeps telling me my account is suspended when trying to claim the points earned. Not like it used to be.
every video post links to a wrong video...it's been broken over the last several "updates". Very amateurish app to have Microsofts name on it!!! WEIRD.
When I try to watch any videos, they are all one single random video and not what the link says. It's getting really annoying. This used to be my favorite news app, but not anymore.
Used to be good but now no matter which video you click it goes to the wrong video. Guess I'll have to find another news app.

most articles are written with such unique perspectives that it takes 500 words before the actual point of the story is revealed. And, most of the video leads are out of sync with the topic. Believe nothing you read and half of what you see, as the saying goes.
Video links are broken, they take you to a different video rather than which was selected on the main page.
video links go to video not related to what was selected. been this way for many months. where is the correct video?

App constantly restricts your account so you can't redeem your hard earned points anyway. contacting Microsoft only sends cookie cutter responses. So searching daily is a task that won't earn you hardly much so pointless using this.
Something went wrong with the app. When I click on a video story, it plays a different video. So, there is no way to watch the video one wished to watch.

The MSN app is an exceptional platform that consistently delivers a diverse collection of interesting and educational articles. Its well-curated content spans a wide range of topics, from current events to in-depth features, ensuring there is something engaging for every reader. The articles are thoughtfully selected, providing both entertainment and valuable insights that enhance knowledge on various subjects.
problem after problem with rewards, I think am just going to discontinue everything to do with Microsoft. starting with paying for one drive when I already have Google one. thanks
When I click on a news item within the MSN app, I am redirected to completely different app feed. Frustrating.
Good but problems when trying to watch a chosen video. The correct video does not always play.
Video links go to the wrong video. In-article videos don't always work. Sharing links doesn't go to original article. Link to original article isn't provided.

Poor zooming in on "news articles." Great app if you're just angling for reward points. Not great if you were planning to actually read any articles in the process--anything that involves images with text in them, eg comics or screenshot of social media posts, is unreadable because zooming just pixelates them terribly--like you're zooming in on a thumbnail, not the image that you'd see in desktop version--and it rarely provides a link to read the same page in a normal browser.

Really not impressed with the latest update. The daily gaining points for reading articles has been dropped / taken off the app completely?! I read a lot of articles but Don't fill in polls or do quizzes etc . Now only getting points when checking in daily , sorry MSN you have really let a good app fall well below par on this one. Please reinstall this option as I know it was a very popular part of the app & no doubt , I will not be the only one who is missing it!

Edit 7/1/25... It worked perfectly for about a week, now it's been broken again for a couple weeks and the one thing that actually still worked, reading the news, is gone.!! Enough is enough. I'm out Quit "fixing" it! Every time you try to fix the app it gets more broken. Go back to the original Start format that everything worked on and leave it alone.
If you click an article with a video you don't get the one you selected you get all videos.
works perfectly well. gets all local, national and international news worldwide.
This weather channel displays more data than any other I've seen. I really enjoyed using it and I highly recommend it.
many of the links, especially from Slingshot News, dont work or give the wrong article or video.

title: ChatGPT
description:
Introducing ChatGPT for Android: OpenAI‚Äôs latest advancements at your fingertips.

This official app is free, syncs your history across devices, and brings you the latest from OpenAI, including the new image generator.

With ChatGPT in your pocket, you‚Äôll find:

¬∑ Image generation‚ÄìGenerate original images from a description, or transform existing ones with a few simple words. 
¬∑ Advanced Voice Mode‚ÄìTap the soundwave icon to have a real-time convo on the go. Settle a dinner table debate, or practice a new language. 
¬∑ Photo upload‚ÄîSnap or upload a picture to transcribe a handwritten recipe or get info about a landmark. 
¬∑ Creative inspiration‚ÄîFind custom birthday gift ideas or create a personalized greeting card.
¬∑ Tailored advice‚ÄîTalk through a tough situation, ask for a detailed travel itinerary, or get help crafting the perfect response. 
¬∑ Personalized learning‚ÄîExplain electricity to a dinosaur-loving kid or easily brush up yourself on a historic event.
¬∑ Professional input‚ÄîBrainstorm marketing copy or map out a business plan.
¬∑ Instant answers‚ÄîGet recipe suggestions when you only have a few ingredients.

Join hundreds of millions of users and try the app captivating the world. Download ChatGPT today.

Terms of service & privacy policy:
https://openai.com/policies/terms-of-use
https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy

summary: The official app by OpenAI

scraped_reviews.content: Great, and very helpful with stories and stuff, and punctuation, etc etc. However currently, when I edit a message, it just makes/sends a new message and doesn't change the old one. This is incredibly frustrating as if it gives me a bad response from something I said, I can't remove it so now I'm forced to spend an entire paragraph fixing it. For as long as this is an issue, it will remain 3 stars. Can now edit correctly: 5 stars

The image feature is almost useless to me because it doesn't even work. Whenever I ask for an image, it just shows up as a little circle with a "1" inside of it. On top of that, you can only create like 2 or 3 photos for free until you have to wait 20 hours for another 2-3 photos, and usually they aren't even the best quality when it works. When I tried to report it as a "bad response," the app completely crashes. So, I came here. That's why I gave 3 stars. I get why it's expensive, but jeez.

it is so difficult to see text voice together. gone through setyings,can't find, back to dotscurvles and the horizontal lines and see no settings to make sure I have voice, both our texts. I've not found this difficult on other chats. perhaps I move on. I wanted to try Gpt but it looks like you don't want me. I've tried walking thru but having to read text and switch back and forth and still not see what I need is beyond frustrating when one has had a frustrating day in court. ty.

$20 a month!!?? They have to be kidding! it doesn't even do everything you ask for saying that it might be "copyrighted" most of the time. When it does do something it freezes up and says error. To the developers, this is not worth $20 a month. Maybe if it was alot faster and had better or options period to adjust what is drawn then maybe $9.99 a month.

I actually love the app and use it regularly to help develop my skills as a writer. Brainstorming with it has been great, however lately I do notice it's slip in memory. I also notice it becoming more and more restrictive, if I'm writing a battle scene and any sort of anything it deems harmful is a nope. Action, fight and these sort of scenes are where I need practice and help so it sucks. I've almost cancels premium because of restrictions.

I have the pro edition. it works great for short works, but for longer works, you have to continually tell it the rules again. it's like that guy who forgets meeting you 5 minutes ago. It's absolutely fantastic for generating pictures. but cannot repeat the same picture with minor changes. so, for single use projects it's great. Not so in the long run. like writing a book. lots of challenges in that.

I enjoy a lot about chat GPT and could either give it a 5 or 1. I would say a 1 as a subscription and a 5 as a free version. Image generation limits can be ridiculous as sometimes it will generate images that you did not ask it to and they count against you. Recently I have had trouble with it saying my request are explicit or asking for medical advice even if they are not remotely. It may come up with an idea and then say it can't do that because it violates content policy. Frustrating üòû

This was a fantastic tool for helping to do research and a voice to brainstorm with. Now it can't even tell me what's in the list I just provided it. It struggles to be coherent and fails even basic tests of memory while claiming it is still functioning correctly. When version 5 came out I didn't see any immediate change, but it has gotten worse to the point I can't use it anymore. So long writing partner.

Update...app cuts you off constantly. I don't want to have to keep my finger pressed on the screen to talk you should be able to do this hands-free without getting cut off mid sentence. doesn't really understand friendly casual conversation, it's more like you're being interviewed. AND $200 for unlimited?? insane! how about unlimited for just conversation at a much more reasonable rate.

Use to work great, now starting in October of 25, something has changed. It rarely follows directions and functions more like it did about 2 years ago before I had a subscription. I'm nearly finished paying for this service at this point, I'm ready to find an alternative because it's no longer meeting my needs. When I dictate my input only to be lost repeatedly, that puts the finishing touches on my frustration with this app. There are too many good alternatives now.... it's been nice.

it started out great, then I hit the image limit, so I paid for plus, $20, get more benefits and photos, i was totally ok with that. I then had to wait for photos to become available. 36 hours later. still waiting, I've used the help feature, tells me I'm "stuck" no trouble shooting has helped. I have now been escalated for a response in 2-3 days and in the meantime I just sit here paying for a feature that I cant use AND the help bot has stopped responding to anything.

gpt 5 is infuriating. its strong in weird and hard to navigate to wear you want. if feels like it has no memory and its too focused on taking up as little of my time as possible and not focused enough on accuracy or deep thinking, research, and it goes on and on. if i had more than 25 promps or whatever it is that you get in a day, i would be able to get good use out of it but as of right now it is tough.

the app is messed up and upsetting. if you have any images shared or retrieved it comes up with an error and states you have to wait 5 hours for any new files to be uploaded. but after the wait time, even days later, it still won't let you upload any files. I've done everything from logging out to clearing data and cache but still it has the block. I don't mind waiting 5 hours but days later and still the same message comes up, it's ridiculous honestly. this app is disappointing.

horrible, I paid $20 monthly subscription fee and have not been able to activate the plus subscription. I have emailed for the past 2 week, approximately 30 emails back and forth. There has been no resolution and they won't give be a refund. they couldn't find a solution and instead of a refund they slowly stopped responding.

It‚Äôs truly so disappointing American companies, despite the vast wealth their government holds, come off as incredibly stingy and cheap. For even the smallest, most basic services, you‚Äôre forced to pay a significant amount. ChatGPT is no different. All I wanted was for it to calculate the price of an item from a photo ‚Äî a simple task. But no, I absolutely have to upgrade to Plus and pay up just to get that done. Otherwise, it won‚Äôt provide the necessary help for free.

I've been paying for the upgraded plan for a few months and it is definitely NOT worth it. The whole app is becoming useless. Won't create a usable download links and is only accurate about 10% of the time lately. Web searches are never even close accurate. I'll be going back to the free version and finding another AI app to use. Gemini has become more capable lately. And don't get me started on how slow it is for everything. 15 minutes for a single jpg is crazy.

GPT-5 has rendered this next to useless. I give it a second star only because it's still somewhat helpful in some areas, but for the most part, it does nothing but stress me out lately. It does not follow prompts correctly or accurately, it repeats itself constantly even when instructed not to. It's presumptuous is the worst way. It's not creative anymore. It doesn't help me brainstorm anymore. And it's been completely neutered. I am beyond fed up. Unsubscribed and might soon uninstall.

I enjoyed this app from the beginning and even upgraded to the plus subscription. But for some reason, I've been unable to view ANY created files for the past month, which is extremely irritating considering that I'm paying for a subscription. Other than that, I would still recommend this app to anyone, especially since you can do so much with the free version. It has helped me with recipe creation, calculating calories and macros for all my family meals, and individualized workout plans.

The app is fine, don't get me wrong, but I do have a couple of suggestions. One, if you want your customers to upgrade, at least offer a free trial first (student discounts help too!) because not everyone is willing or able to pay $20. Also, I understand wanting to limit adult content, but you can verify ages by scanning IDs instead of essentially putting a parental lock on everything; financial apps do it all of the time.

Voice mode is trash, whenever I try to send it a voice message or I try to talk with it in realtime voice mode it always fails, 90% of the times, specially when the message is long enough. I really love chatgpt but I can't give it more than 1 star having this issue, that "a network error occurred, please try again" after a long talk is just infuriating, I don't have words to describe how angry it makes me feel like.

GPT-5 is horrendous! I am a plus user and even when I switch it back to 4o, it will automatically go back to 5! Or it will say it's on 4o, but you can tell it's not by how it talks! It doesn't have a good memory anymore, messes up frequently, and it's extremely disappointing to see how fast this is going downhill. I am considering ending my subscription if something doesn't change.

I'm only using the free version right now, which currently is good enough but not for long. Because the more I use it, the more I see the potential the paying platform would or does have. The most annoying things about the free version are "all" the limitations aka having limits on certain features. But to be honest it's perfect for beginners, let me rephrase that and I'll say it's enough for this beginner (me) and gives me a good enough idea of what I'll get when I start paying for it.

Ever since GPT5, it's giving me dumber answers. On mobile, voice mode either does this weird double click sound and spazzes, doesn't hear me, interupts me, or it hears something completely different from what I actually said. Then there's extremely strict time limits on "advanced voice". Also, Chat GPT in browser doesn't work without freezing up. It's no longer worth $20/m, so after years of using it, I've decided to cancel my subscription. Moving to another model.

This app seemed ok at first but in the long run it has wasted my time with bad information, lost files/data/ hours of trying to get my data exported etc. I can't possibly tell you how ignorant this AI is. Don't trust it! And if you do, sign up with a password instead of using, Sign Up with Google or other methods. You will be permanently attached to that service and will never be able to switch a password. The security of this system really sucks nuts!!! I am deleting it with the joy of escaping

DO NOT PAY FOR PLUS. I did because it said you could make more images and faster than with the free version. I paid for plus and was told I still have to wait 9 hours before I can make another image even though I've not made any today! can't seem to get my money back either. AND here we are 2 days later and I haven't used the app at all. and it's telling me I've still reached the limit and have to wait 9 hours!? even though I paid for plus. What a scam!

My ChatGPT Plus subscription is not syncing to the mobile or desktop apps, despite being active and working on the web version. I have tried all standard troubleshooting steps reinstalling the apps, clearing cache, and logging out/in multiple times without success. Support has confirmed there is no way to force a sync or escalate the issue, acknowledging that it is a backend problem likely related to a recent update. As a paying customer, it's frustrating that the core product is broken.

After the latest updates, the AI ‚Äã‚Äãhas become dumber and more useless. You ask it to do something, and it does different things, and after several conversations, you're forced to upgrade to the premium version. You can't pay for a service when, every time you try to get information, they give you incorrect answers or tell you you're breaking certain rules. To top it all off, you're not allowed to change the GPT version.

Still has some glitches that need to be worked out. It almost is like trying to input too much information into a system, and that system becomes confused. It seems that it can't compute too many changes when working on a document. Try to get as much information in one or two edits because after that, it just goes a little haywire, with changing the entire document, small grammatical errors, spelling errors, and other little things.

Has great ideas and helps me more fully express who I. And, I have spent the past 4 hours trying to get it to properly format my resume, with it telling me all the formatting is going to be perfect, and the output generated is all in plain text. And then it tries again and fixes some of the issues but inexplicably makes other changes also, and then tells me it's lost all memory of this session and we need to start over from the beginning. Attempt number three, here we go...

This isn‚Äôt free or a one-time $20 purchase ‚Äî I pay monthly. I expect reliable, accurate images. Instead, the assistant often puts in wrong or random details (like trees in the middle of a pool, or messed-up dimensions) and makes simple picture requests take many many tries. It should be clean and accurate the first time, especially since I‚Äôm paying

freezes on desktop every single time I ask a question. I've tried literally everything from updates to clearing cache. every time I ask it something on desktop I have to wait until I think it's done formulating a response, bring up the task manager and force it to stop, then open it again. as expensive as the monthly subscription is, it should work so much better than this.

The voice to text feature is way too buggy. There are several instances where I finish talking, tap on see text, and it says "please check your internet connection." if you're lucky, you can retry a few times and it might go through. Worse, if you already had text in the text box, it's ignored. Otherwise, say goodbye to your message. It's 2025 - your recording should either be cached in memory temporarily, or sent to the server in chunks if it's too long. I've unsubscribed.

ChatGPT is brilliant! It saves so much time and makes writing much easier. If you‚Äôre unsure what to write for a job application email, or need to send something quickly and easily, it really helps. It‚Äôs also great for finding information and assisting with all kinds of tasks. I use it for everything! The only downside is that you have to pay for upgrades, and sometimes you need to reset and create new chats. other than that its great

it's great until it is not. app frequently does not work. get error messages that say to try again later. I have looked for updates, uninstalled, and reinstalled. all my projects disappeared and dont show up in my history panel. tried searching and getting that stupid error message again. also sucks at editing. sometimes, I need to make a small fix on one thing, and it changes something else umprompted. causing a downward spiral of fix-its on something that should have been an easy task.

it's not accurate enough to for the company to charge people. it has too many issues with keeping memory, the picture limit even though you don't post any pictures that day you can only ask 3-4 questions and it tells you that you have to wait 5 hours because you have pictures in this conversation. from what I read even if I paid for the upgrade it does the same thing. there are definitely better AI models.

There is an issue with the app. There were a couple of times where my prompts suddenly vanished in thin air, when I tried sending them. It's like, Chat GPT never even received them or registered them into the system. I noticed that this glitch or issue happens when you leave the app, and it stays running idly in the background. And when you come back to it, we're talking about 20 mins later, that's when the bug or issue occurs. Chat GPT does not respond or receive prompts, upon sending.

Seems like it's getting to that point where once it gets enough users, it becomes worse with new updates and more subscription-forced with each update. You used to be able to send way more texts, endless basically. Now it says 'You've hit your limit' constantly after several messages. It's gonna probably get more cons from here üôÑ disappointing for the one purpose. Now new updates are a dread.

5.0 isn't as intelligent or insightful as 4.o. There's something wrong with the way it writes (composes thoughts); it sounds rudimentary now. It lost it's IQ. I noticed I started using it less recently, as a result, and I'm not sure it'll be worth paying for anymore. I just realized that I can unenable auto update, but it's too late now.

in the times I've had the app,it's been great,it's helped me a lot up until now,except the fact out of nowhere it's deciding that I can pay,but not have access,I have the plus subscription,it's in my subscription details,but it keeps saying error,if the developers can fix this issue so I can get what I'm paying for,I'll do a great review and leave 5 stars,I just need access to what was advertised is all

The AI is often frustrating and often ignores data saved into its memory or from earlier on in the conversation. I also wish that there was a way to switch between the older models as the older ones were quite entertaining. I also wish that there were ways to recover deleted conversations, and have a way to download personalities and memories that other users have managed to get instead of going through the hassle to do it manually

I've been using a paid subscription for several months, but the last couple of months have been absolutely terrible. The chat is incredibly slow. I created invoices and various business information and downloaded them as PDFs, but now I'm constantly having problems with it: files not found, something else, and the chat is slow and doesn't do what I ask it to do. Unsubscribing.

Amazing tool, but it keeps stalling/freezing to the point I can not use it effectively. I am a paying customer... The graphics are fun but do not match spatial logic. AI will summarize a system in text correctly but does not have the ability to create an accurate image, e.g., a hydronic system, a bathroom with proper placement of items, etc.

when it works, it's great... BUT it constantly freezes, lags, crashes etc daily. Not a daily tool for a team of people to use or rely on. As much as I hate to say MS has a more consistent app for use if you want multiple people utilizing a single app across the board. And I am subscribed! Very frustrating to set up a process over weeks and find out this app is just a toy!

It's been downhill ever since they removed the o1 model. Shorter and more inconsistent responses and really serious misinformation. The sudden removal of more models when they released gpt-5 without warning on the app or site beforehand... But hey, at least the folders are nice. Now they have released a cheaper tier in some regions, including mine, so I was going to give it one more chance... Only to find that it costs 3 times the price I saw adverticed in dollars.

I've used this for a while with a subscription. Started out fine but got continuously worse as time went on. Voice doesn't listen to prompts, pictures do not have what i asked for, resume help generates work experience I have never had even after expressly asking for what I want. Takes 30 minutes for it to actually do what I want if it ever does. And I am very clear. I can send a paragraph with extremely detailed instructions and it does not matter. Save your money and use another ai

This app has so many errors since it switched. I even paid for the subscription in order to continue using 40. I'm very disappointed that the standard voice is changing. At least give us the option. That is the voice that many of us have grown comfortable with and now you are taking it away. Doubt I will continue to pay for something you are ruining.

Extremely frustrating to use, especially after the newest update. It no longer follows instructions. I use it to write stories for myself to read. Today I have specifically aksed it multiple times to let the scene breath and not fade out, close the scene, summarize, time jump, or give closing reflections. And it didn't follow instructions. I will cancel subscription.

It tells me information, but then it contradicts itself, so it'll tell me, oh do this, and I'll be doing that. Then, when I create a whole new chat and I ask it, it tells me something completely different. It's unreliable, and when I was using it to analyze my workouts. I'll post my workouts, but if it gets too long, it starts leaving gaps, and I really have to curse it out. Call it worthless, getting really frustrated by it for it to finally get it, about ninety-nine percent, right.

Updated: Went from 5 stars to 0! Recently changed and there is no "model picker" for PAID Plus users. I'm stuck with 5 and it's awful. Pretty useless. I want 4o. That's why I'm paying and if I can't use it, I'll cancel and use something else. It was bad enough when they released 5 and it was a lobotomized version of 4o but at least I had the option to choose a legacy model. I'll be heading to the "cancel subscription" page from here.

I've used this app for a year now, and it‚Äôs absolutely amazing. I've watched it grow and improve, and it personally helped me publish two books that I was struggling to write and get my ideas out there. It also helped me understand concepts that I normally would've struggled with. It's truly an amazing tool, and even saying that doesn't give enough credit to what this AI can do for you. Its capabilities are pretty much limitless it just depends on your creativity.

title: Yousician: Learn & Play Guitar
description:
YOUSICIAN is the fast, fun way to learn, play and master the Guitar, Bass or to be your best singer. Make music with Yousicians around the world. Master instruments or learn to sing thousands of songs in a fun and easy way!

Out of tune? Yousician is here to help as your personal music teacher. Tune your strings, warm up your voice, and learn to play with interactive lessons to navigate bass or guitar frets. Get instant feedback to make sure to hit the right chords and notes as you make music, perfecting your bass or guitar riffs.

Our learning path, designed by experts, will help musicians of all levels improve. Nail each bass and guitar chord through fun gameplay that tracks your progress and keeps you motivated. Refine your vocals with singing lessons packed with easy-to-follow instructions.

Grab your guitar or bass, and prepare those vocal chords. It‚Äôs time to make music!

YOUSICIAN IS FOR:
‚Ä¢ Guitarists
‚Ä¢ Bass players
‚Ä¢ Singers
‚Ä¢ Complete beginners
‚Ä¢ Self-learners
‚Ä¢ Advanced & professional musicians

LEARN ACOUSTIC GUITAR, ELECTRIC GUITAR, & BASS 
- Learn to play chords from guitar tabs & lessons for songs with step-by-step tutorials
- Learn sheet music, strumming, melodies, lead, fingerpicking, and finger placement on guitar frets
- Learn to play solos and guitar riffs
- Develop acoustic guitar skills, master classic chords, & fingerpicking
- Play bass and master your instrument with a fun, interactive music teacher
- Tuning made easy with our in-app bass and guitar tuner
- Our gamified learning makes playing instruments fun

NEED TO IMPROVE YOUR SINGING TONE? 
- Our virtual vocal coach has interactive lessons that listen as you practice
- Refine your vocals in singing lessons with instant feedback
- Discover your potential as you make music and refine your singing tone

LESSONS FOR EVERY MUSICIAN
- From bass and guitar to singing lessons ‚Äì Yousician has you covered
- Get over 10,000 lessons, exercises and songs by artists you love
- Make music with guitar chord progressions

Start your free trial today and experience the best way to learn music!

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
Subscribe for unlimited and uninterrupted playtime across all platforms. Subscription types are annual plans billed in monthly installments, upfront annual and monthly plans. Prices may vary in different countries. Subscription automatically renews at the end of each term unless auto-renew is turned off in your Yousician account on yousician.com. If you use a Google Play store account, you can cancel your subscription from there.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT YOUSICIAN
‚ÄúYousician is modern technology's gift to music education. It‚Äôs an app that teaches you to master the guitar instead of a plastic game controller.‚Äù - Guitar World

‚ÄúYousician is a fabulous place to start learning piano, guitar, ukulele or bass. Yousician teaches basic playing techniques and musical notation by presenting a challenge and then listening as you try to play in real life.‚Äù - New York Times

ABOUT YOUSICIAN
Yousician is the world‚Äôs leading platform to learn and play music. With a combined 20 million monthly users across our award-winning apps, we‚Äôre on a mission to make musicality as common as literacy.

Check out our other apps:
‚Ä¢ GuitarTuna, the #1 guitar tuner app worldwide
‚Ä¢ Ukulele by Yousician
‚Ä¢ Piano by Yousician

Got ideas to make Yousician even better? Simply send your ideas and suggestions to: feedback.yousician.com
‚Ä¢ https://yousician.com/privacy-notice
‚Ä¢ https://yousician.com/terms-of-service
