summary: Share the moment!

scraped_reviews.content: as a social media app, it's fun. however, I get recommended inappropriate content on both my stories and discover when I don't want it. I try blocking those accounts that show up on my stories page, but it straight up doesn't work - when I refresh the page, it recommends the account I just blocked. If you're debating getting this app for your children - DON'T. It's way too easy to start seeing really inappropriate/borderline üåΩ content, without even interacting with it.

TOO MANY ADS! Any content you watch is interrupted with an advertisement every 5 seconds, and the content itself is usually click-bait. Stop sending ads directly to me, too! Adding songs to my snaps can be annoying because the app won't let me use certain parts of the song (if the song is even on here). I don't like that I can't get rid of MyAI.

It selectively refuses to allow you to hide certain accounts from discover, and it will not allow you to contact a human at snapchat to resolve the issue. I've blocked one account at least 5 times. If I try to hide it, it just says something went wrong, but only for that particular account. I've updated the app 3 times and reset my phone and everything. Oddly, it literally only does this on thirst trap accounts, too. I don't want to see it.

the app was always a fad that would die out eventually, but they got one thing right which was well categorized, by date, digital media. it was easy to navigate and did its job well. Changing your policy this late in the game to charge people for their own data, especially when it's the only reason most people still have your app installed at all, is it a great way to ensure that your app will die

The forced stories of strangers and ads is just about the final push I need to leave this app behind. After years of people complaining about the "Friend is typing..." push notification, it is still there. The execs do not care what we like or dislike. Also, if you add text to your snap it won't always show up on other people's screens, especially if it is near the edges of the screen. It will look perfect when you are editing, but it will send with some text cut off or not visible.

I have a Samsung, and used the app to chat with friends with IPhones so we can make groupchats, video call, or send voice memos. Unfortunately for me this app prioritizes ios, so I can always count on loads of glitches and bugs. I dislike the discover page, which you can't avoid since it takes up most of the screen if you go to view friends' stories. I HATE the creepy new 3D bitmoji style. An AI chatbot stays at the top of your inbox even if you never talk to it, and no way to get rid of it.

Dumb app, extremely basic, annoying to use, but some people I know outright REFUSE to communicate any other way, so I'm here. My real issue is that today, I have been unable to load snaps, and several that I want to send just aren't sending. I also can't view my friends list at all. I've got a perfect wifi connection, so it has to be the app; what's going on?

I'd give more stars, but I don't appreciate getting the same notification over and over again. Even after fixing them to how I want them to be, I'll get the same notification about stories about 10 times. I can delete the notification, and as soon as I swipe, the same one pops back up within seconds. Ridiculous. The add music option doesn't allow me to hear the music either. I can't hear any sound while editing the photo or clip I'm trying upload to stories until after it's posted.

My account has been locked multiple times without any valid reason (7 days, 2 weeks, 1 month). Despite reaching out countless times for a refund on my premium subscription, I have received zero responses. Their automated claim points to third-party apps, but that's just an excuse. I have consistently sought confirmation, yet they remain silent because they lack real evidence. It is no coincidence that my account was locked right after my subscription payment. They're after money not support.

Over the past two weeks, Snapchat‚Äôs hands-free recording has become a major inconvenience. Previously, the app would just cut off the video at the limit and let me send it. Now, it allows me to record beyond the limit and then forces me to edit the video down to under two minutes. This makes it difficult to deliver my message naturally and adds unnecessary hassle. It‚Äôs frustrating and definitely not user friendly anymore

Don't bother downloading! It started out alright but over time it just got SO POLLUTED WITH ADS! As if it wasn't bad enough to have a full length ad every 4 shorts, they send ads to me as chats! What is this talk of making me pay for my own memories?? If they really go through with making me pay to keep my own photos, I'm deleting the app for good, as it's the only reason I've kept it this long in the first place.

Used to love this, but now they're rolling out a "feature" to make users pay for the only thing most of us still have the app for. Won't let me download my memories or other data. The option to do it is gone. Disappointed in the company, they're taking subscriptions too far. They should have just stuck with their first snap+ idea, which actually added to the app instead of taking away.

Why do I have to PAY for my own photos? I have multiple pictures on there of important memories I want to hang onto. This app already has a torturous amount of ads, and I can barely do anything without giving a notification to someone. The only reason I got it, is to be able to communicate on face time with friends that have iOS. Again, I don't think I should have to pay $2+ MONTHLY from what I've seen, to see old photos that I've kept there SO I can see them again. This app sucks.

I've been using it for 4 years. I have so many pictures I love on there just for my account to get logged out. I reached out for support. I don't have access to my old email that was linked to the account, but I had all the necessary information needed to prove it was me, yet they refused to help. Their support sucks, their app sucks, their system sucks.

I have had my phone for over a year and have done update after update after update with the hope that one update will just magically fix the issue I am having. As of now I basically can't use ANY filter due to lagging and refusal to load It doesn't matter if I'm on wifi or not or if I'm here there or anywhere they will not load or stop lagging so I can actually use them. I have never had issues before but all of a sudden I do. I have all but stop app use for this reason.

I have used this app since 2017, and I have a lot of memories of friends and family , etc... I don't appreciate having to pay for more storage for my memories. That's a little bit ridiculous ,it should be free!! I can understand to pay for editing chats with your friends and family and changing the app icon ect ect. but I shouldn't have to pay for more storage. This would be a five-star review, but not until the paying for more storage is gone.

It's getting bad... I use Snap as a daily messenger, and it works okay for that. Now Snap floods your home page with ads in a way that "masquerades" as an actual person snapping you. Very aggressive and wierd... They also added an "AI buddy" that's glued to the top of your home page, but unlike actual users, you can't hide or block it, it stays at the top of your page FOREVER. But of course you can hide it if you pay for their membership! I'm now looking for an alternative for me and my friends.

I have been using snapchat since 2014. As time has gone on, we have lost great features and gained some mediocre ones, but did get memories that I have used for about a decade. I was very disappointed when I started noticing my snap memories were disappearing a while back, I just assumed the quality was too low to keep (older phone) but now I'm being told that they're still being stored and I now have to pay for storage. The monthly cost is far too much, I am considering deleting!

I refuse to charge for memories to stay stored. A huge point of the app is the memories feature. The fact they want to implement a payment system for it, which is the main reason people use it at all, is unacceptable. A base feature of an app since day 1 should never have to be paid for. I and many others would rather uninstall after transferring memories elsewhere.

I can't chat, call, or snap with my friend lately, streaks end even when we are able to get through, and there are no ways to contact support for help. The support site just loops you around the same pages and is no help after you have exhausted the few troubleshooting options available. Submitting bug reports just gets ignored. Tried removing each other and now we can't add each other back, even when I can see them in the search and in my contacts. Total mess and no help anywhere to be found.

I've had this app since I was in 7th grade. I'm a Junior in college. I've seen this app change over time and in some ways improve, but as of recent, learning about how we can't save our memories because we need to pay for them, I find it absurd. Paying for our own data is not right. I only kept this app so long because of the memories. if you go through with the payments, I will be deleting. I'm willing to lose my progress on my 2500 day streak. I don't care

Absolutely horrific that If I don't pay to keep my memories I have 12 months before they're deleted. I have many important things there and storage issues, especially with the fact I'm going to need to save everything. Many, many other users as well. Memories are the reason I even have this app still and that goes for many others. It's the main reason so many people use this app or most would only have Instagram. I hope something is done because I know myself and many will not be using this app.

Forcing to pay for yet ANOTHER subscription model for storage is insane! I have had Snapchat since middle school, im almost 30, that is nearly 2 DECADES worth of photos/videos, many of which from my childhood, photos of family/pets that are no longer with me. Through several phone replacements, this app was the reason i got a lot of photos transferred. If the app decides to go this route, there will be no reason for me to continue using it.

heard about snapchat beginning to charge for the memory feature. absolutely ridiculous to charge for something we have had for years. not cool. I've had my account for almost 10 years, have streaks 1000s of days long, and use the app every day as one of my main forms of communication. if y'all go through with charging for memories, I will leave the app. do better.

In a vacuum, Snapchat is a good app that lets you communicate with others in some creative ways. Once upon a time, Snapchat was known mostly for its 'Snap' feature and all of the lenses that came with it. Nowadays literally every other texting app lets you do the same things, except the cool thing is that those apps aren't pushing advertisements in between your conversations, and it's one of the first things you see when opening the app. I'm actively looking for something else, do the same

Snapchat has gone above and beyond expectations with their extended features and upgrades. A bit of a learning curve for the not so tech savvy. I love the filters, you can turn a gloomy day into a great photo opportunity where the sun is always shining and everyday is magic. We all get busy in our day to day lives. I love that no matter what I'm doing, I can always find time to snap a quick photo, just a fragment of my day but a memory forever. My way of saying hey.. I thought of you today. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Disappointed that the app will be charging its members for memories. The coolest part about this app was the fact that you could keep your pictures from years ago to look back on without needing to be stored on your phone directly. You could access it on any device as long as you logged into your account. Losing that feature ( unless you plan to pay for it) is definitely going to affect the app expirience negatively.

Needs some work. The current bug situation is horrible. I'll click a notification and the app freezes on the "loading page" and I'll have to close the app completely and go back in. I'll also be typing and mid sentence the app either closes or my keyboard freezes. I thought it was my phone but multiple friends and acquaintances complain of the same issue. I'm about ready to Uninstall it bc it seems to be getting more frequent / worse as times go on. update: I'm not paying to keep MY PHOTOS. bye

The idea that we have to pay to access memories on this app that has only gotten worse over the years is absolutely criminal. I've backed up my memories so I'll be fine, but if they go through with this change, I will be deleting the app and never looking back. The erasure of seeing my friends stories being demoted to a sliver of the top of the screen, and the bulk of the stories page being flooded with ads and being able to "discover" a bunch of random influencers I don't care for is idiotic.

when I go to send an image, I cant get my whole friends list to pop up. I cant send my mass good Morning snaps, because it literally won't send. now, I have to send it one by one to each individual person. I Uninstalled the app, restarted my phone, even checked my wifi. issue seems to be with the app itself. Been using for a couple years and its the only way to talk to most of my friends.

I have used snapchat for probably almost 10 years now and Ive always loved it. However, I am now getting ads, which I block, and still receive somehow. Now, I'm hearing that starting next year you will have to pay to KEEP memories?? Almost 10 years of memories down the drain because snapchat wants to get greedy. Im surprised they dont make enough from the snapchat plus, which I paid for up until recently. This app had so much potential and it was crushed almost instantly for me.

when I take a photo, it gets exported in excess of 30 copies per photo to be sold. When they're sold, underneath the photo is a cash app receipt and a dollar amount. It makes me feel like filth. They are not dirty or pornographic, just head shots, which is what he's planning, to shoot me in the head with an M24 when I stop or go public with this. That's my Snapchat experience. The app does have beautiful filters and make beautiful photos. I don't have 1 photo or $1 to show for it.

The block feature apparently does nothing to the discover page. The number of times I've had to block these accounts is ridiculous. Not to mention Snapchat continuously recommends friending people I don't know. No matter how many times I select the option. And now they're threatening to move our memories behind a paywall? Disgusting and greedy company. One of the worst apps when it comes to the decisions they make.

As if the ads aren't enough, now they're going to start a subscription model to keep and store our data? Save and export your media file while you can. The memory and camera features are the only reason I still keep this app over the competitors. If they're truly switching to the subscription I'm going to remove my app from my phone. Such a shame, it's been great until this, so long OG Snapchat.

My AI is absolutely horrible. I don't want it in my chat feed and there is no way to get rid of it. It randomly stops working and I won't get notifications of messages. Sometimes it just won't load. Yes I make sure my app is updated to try to avoid these bugs. But in the end I'm tired of my AI and all the problems we have continuously with snapchat. And now having to pay for things such as memories that have been free for years? Unacceptable.

I've been a user since 2015, it has 10 years of photos of mine saved and now I'm going to be charged to save them, or I have downsize to 5G, or download to a different device that I don't have the storage for, or they will be automatically deleted. If this doesn't change, you've lost a user and probably around a few million others. The free storage is the main reason we all still use the app.

The memory storage feature of snapchat is probably one of the best features about the app, which multiple people (myself included) only mainly use the app for it. Forcing users to pay for it, something that was free from launch, is extremely greedy! Snapchat already offers a paid membership, which including NEW things that people can use. Most people have years of memories and to then lock it behind a paywall is sickening. I would have not used the app if I knew id have to pay in the future.

(2014) Notification will show I have a message. I open the app and no message. It seems to be deleting them before I can see them. When I try to share pics from my gallery, they're upside down. (2025) Why am I still on this horrendous app? To communicate with my kid when their phone service goes down. Now I don't receive notifications until ~18 hours later. The reels are ridiculous. Snap itself sends messages that I don't want to click on but I have to to clear out my in app notifications.

Every time I turn on my phone, im constantly bombarded with notifications about my story post from a year or two ago. I could not care less about how old the post is, yet I get a new notification every 10 minutes it seems. It's only really decent for contacting friends, but even then, people have issues with üåΩ popping up and not a whole lot to do about it.

This app sucks! Constant updates that only make it worse. Your recent update saying to keep things running smoothly did not work. You seemed to have added more glitches. Maybe you should make sure things work correctly before you roll out updates. Also I am unable to contact support in app. It says my email is connected to another account. That is balderdash. I had to enter my email to create my current account. How can it be already used?

This app is already basic and has too many ads. It's nice to have for group chats and taking pics, but all the extra stuff is unnecessary. If you (the folks behind Snapchat) go through with the storage update, we will all leave. It's not a threat, it's the truth...You're low star ratings are already too relatable; you won't be able to bounce back from this. Please reconsider, or at least give us time to save the YEARS of our lives in photos and videos from being vaporized.

I've had Snapchat for 5+ years now and it's great, I probably spend the most time on it and have thousands of pictures and saved in memories. I recently heard that starting this month, they are going to start charging for storage, something that's always been a free part of the app. If they start this, I will be deleting the app. It's sad, but what am I to do? Spend like 20 bucks a month for a dying app when I can't afford rent? Do better snap :(

Dissapointed and frustrated that we will need to pay for storing memories. I have a bunch of media (pictures and videos) of pets that have long pasted away and great memories from college. I'm saddened that I might lose great moments of my life captured within pictures and video. But I'm not willing to pay those fees. I'm highly debating on even keeping the app at all. Very dissapointed in Snap Inc. for implementing this new change.

Snapchat was fine until I consistently got bombarded with ads and inappropriate content from OF "Models". I tried everything to block and report, but nothing changed. On top of that, I recently saw that stored memories will disappear if they exceed 5GB. If we want them to stay, then we would have to pay a subscription, which is completely ridiculous. Many users only have snapchat for the memories, and now they're at risk of disappearing. People DO NOT want to pay for keeping their memories.

I don't need an hourly reminder that someone posted something new. Once is enough, especially when I've dismissed it. Also, when i block someone, I expect them to stay blocked and not keep appearing. wow. now instead of fixing the annoying ex feature, you're now also sending me notifications to "watch this" on some complete stranger's vanity post. Just stop. edit: you've become even clingier. that's just cringe for you.

The app itself is fine. All the ads for it on other apps are annoying. Especially the ads that just take you to snapchat when you try to dismiss the ad. If I'm passing time while I eat lunch with a game, I don't need snapchat opening itself and showing me eating. Seriously, snapchats ads make me want to delete the app. The ads for this app on other apps have gone from annoying to offensive. Too long. Too annoying. Too intrusive. Just stop.

I've been using snap for YEARS. Since I was about 12, actually (I'm 20 now). I have so many stories stored in my memories on snap because it was the only place that allowed you to take up as much storage as needed without crowding your phone's internal storage. Having a 5gb limit and deleting the memories that go over that limit? I am BEGGING for this to not be an update. Other than that, I've never had any issues. Please don't finalize this 5GB limit üò≠

for starters, when you click one video it shows a million videos before you see the video that you wanted to see. second, there's commercials between all of those videos before you get to see the video that you wanted. basically they intentionally made the free version of the app. terrible to force you into paying for the app. And it takes up far too much space. for example, right now snap is taking up 19 GB of storage space even though I use it the least out of all social media apps.

i love this app. i use it to communicate with all of my friends and family. HOWEVER. i have deleted and re-downloaded it so many times BECAUSE I'll start watching a spotlight video, and an ad will pop up. which is normal i get it. but then i skip the add. and now suddenly all i can see is that specific ad. so ill try ignore it and try to text someone. and it will be all fine, until i try to type. it will continue showing the ad so i can only see it. so ill close the app. AND IT JUST KEEPS GOING.

They refuse to accept no for an answer. If you don't immediately share your contacts with the app, it will request the permissions every. single. time. you reopen the app. It's ridiculous. If I wanted to share my contacts, I would. I do not want to, so stop prompting me. And they also need to get the amount of fraudulent accounts under control. Every single day there are tens of random accounts sending friend requests, and there is no way to prevent them from doing this.

title: StarMaker: Sing Karaoke Songs
description: Want more music-loving friends? Bring out the singer in you in StarMaker‚Äî‚ÄîThe popular Karaoke App is featured by Google PlayüèÜ StarMaker is a popular singing app and music community with 50M+ users globally! Sing karaoke songs, share your special music moments and enjoy the community! üé§Sing Karaoke Songs No matter if you like Pop, Hip Hop, R&B, or Folk, you can now pick your favorites from millions of songs, sing along with the high-quality backing music and rolling lyrics, edit your recordings with professional video filters,voice and audio editor. Share on social platforms like Whatsapp, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Snapchat and more. Also, you can now duet with top artists and sing together with a group of friends just like a superstar! Be a star and start your own music concerts! üìå Professional Sound Effects We have a professional music team. The audio editor function is constantly updated so that you can hear more interesting music. The singing function keep optimizing, the lyrics display is smoother, and the singing experience is better. üéßInteraction We support different ways of interacting. You can create rooms and enjoy singing and playing at any time. This is such an amazing experience! You can even see who is the best player or listen king of singing in the room! We have added many new features for a better experience! Such as: üé§ Pick your favorite songs and latest hits from millions of local and international songs with rolling lyrics. üé§ Record with professional audio editor, using special effects like Distant, Warm, Vinyl, Party, Fascinating, etc. üé§ Edit your selfie music videos with beautiful filters like Vintage, Paris, Sunset, Urban, Spring, etc. üé§ Use pitch correction with audio editor to make you sound like a pro singer. üé§ Use video template to create unique MVs and display lyrics in a more gorgeous way. üé§ Listen to top cover songs and download music to enjoy. üé§ ‚ÄòHook‚Äô allows you to sing the best part of your favorite songs! Duet with top artists or friends and make a recording together! üé§ Join a ‚ÄòFamily‚Äô community to play with other music lovers who share the same tastes as you. üé§ Play various sing games in rooms. Sing and listen from all the hit songs now Including: + Ordinary - Alex Warren + back to friends - sombr + Die With A Smile - Lady Gaga, Bruno Mars + BIRDS OF A FEATHER - Billie Eilish + Don't Say You Love Me - Jin + La Plena - W Sound 05 - W Sound, Be√©le, Ovy On The Drums + APT. - ROS√â, Bruno Mars + undressed - sombr + Love Me Not - Ravyn Lenae + Just Keep Watching (From F1¬Æ The Movie) - Tate McRae, F1 The Album + WILDFLOWER - Billie Eilish + Who - Jimin STAY CONNECTED! Having trouble singing or using the app? Contact our support team through email: appsupport@starmakerinteractive.com We‚Äôll be happy to help and answer all your questions! Visit our official website: https://www.starmakerstudios.com/ Follow us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@starmaker_officialpage Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/starmaker.official.account Subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@StarMakerNetwork Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/starmaker Play with the StarMaker App! To sing, to play, to connect! ‚Äª Permissions [Optional] - Storage: Save photos and videos from StarMaker to your device. - Contacts: Access your device's contacts and add friends. - Photos/Media: Access your gallery, take photos, and record videos. - Microphone: Recording and playback for singing, in Party Rooms, or live streams. - Location: Location-based services, such as adding friends based on location. - Calendar: Add Activity reminders to your calendar. - Bluetooth: Connect to wireless audio devices (for recording, playback, etc.). * You can still use the app even if you do not grant optional permissions. * If you choose not to grant optional permissions, some features may not work properly.

Want more music-loving friends? Bring out the singer in you in StarMaker‚Äî‚ÄîThe popular Karaoke App is featured by Google PlayüèÜ
StarMaker is a popular singing app and music community with 50M+ users globally! Sing karaoke songs, share your special music moments and enjoy the community!

üé§Sing Karaoke Songs
No matter if you like Pop, Hip Hop, R&B, or Folk, you can now pick your favorites from millions of songs, sing along with the high-quality backing music and rolling lyrics, edit your recordings with professional video filters,voice and audio editor. Share on social platforms like Whatsapp, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Snapchat and more.
Also, you can now duet with top artists and sing together with a group of friends just like a superstar! Be a star and start your own music concerts!

üìå Professional Sound Effects

üéßInteraction
We support different ways of interacting. You can create rooms and enjoy singing and playing at any time. This is such an amazing experience! You can even see who is the best player or listen king of singing in the room!

We have added many new features for a better experience! Such as:
üé§ Pick your favorite songs and latest hits from millions of local and international songs with rolling lyrics.

Featuring latest chapters of popular action comics such as Solo Leveling, The Skeleton Soldier, I'm the Max-Level Newbie, and fantasy comics like I Became the Mother of the Evil Male Lead, Born as the Second Daughter,, The Beloved Little Princess, I Woke Up as the Ugly Duckling. Catch up on romantic bestsellers Ashtarte, The Empress Wants To Avoid the Emperor,The Broken Ring: This Marriage Will Fail Anyway, and Popular new romance releases such as I Became the Tyrant's Dishonest Adviser and The Villainess Empress's Attendant. If you are looking for BL, Tappytoon has it all. Cherry Blossoms After Winter, DEAR. DOOR , My Darling Signed Inand How to Snag an Alpha are all available for your reading. Webnovel adaptations Who Made Me a Princess and What It Takes to be a Villainess are also here. ‚ñ∫ Only at Tappytoon - Time Till Free (TTF) lets you read free chapter every 24 hours, hand-picked by our staff - HD Mode makes it possible to read your favroite comics in stunning HD quality - Exclusive on-going deals only for Tappytoon members - Tappytoon Club Membership makes it easy to top-up points and add perks to make reading more affordable ‚ñ∫ Unlock chapters with points Support artists, authors and creators by purchasing and earn free points. Access your unlocked webtoon, manhwa and novel chapters to read anywhere, anytime with your own library, linked with your Tappytoon account. ‚ñ∫ New chapters everyday Tappytoon's comic and manhwa collection spans across action, romance, fantasy, BL and drama. There's comics for everyone. Don't forget to check out our webnovel collection. ‚ñ∫ Official updates of exclusive comics and webnovels Dive into an amazing story! Tappytoon is the official place to read manhwa, webtoon, manga, webnovel you won't find anywhere else. ‚ñ∫ Not quite ready to binge? Explore with free chapters and no sign-up until you're ready. And when you are, signing up will grant you access to exclusive deals available only at Tappytoon. ‚ñ∫ Free tickets to try a new comic Claim tickets to unlock even more chapters of comics, novels and webtoons that you might have missed. ‚ñ∫ Never miss a chapter Subscribe to your favorite stories and we‚Äôll always let you know when a new chapter becomes available. Sort & Filter in comics and novels in Daily, Genre, Library sections. Download now and jump right in to most vibrant comic, manhwa community! Follow Tappytoon‚Ñ¢ on Instagram, Twitter(X), Tiktok, Facebook and YouTube! - Instagram: https://instagram.com/Tappy_toon - Twitter: https://twitter.com/Tappy_toon - Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@tappytoon_official - Facebook: https://facebook.com/Tappytoon - https://www.youtube.com/c/Tappytoon *Time Till Free is available only on select eligible comics/chapters. Eligibility may change at Tappytoon's discretion. *Tappytoon Club Membership subscription automatically renews unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the current period ends. Your account will be charged the same price for renewal within 24-hours before the current subscription period ends. You can turn off auto-renewal at anytime. See the Tappytoon Club Membership page on app for more details. Comics and webtoons are only available in English, French, German language at this time. Novels (webnovels) are only available in English language at this time. --- **Email support: support[@]tappytoon.com Terms of Service: https://www.tappytoon.com/terms Privacy Policy: https://www.tappytoon.com/terms/privacy --- All content on Tappytoon is serviced in official partnership with the respective publishers, creators and artists. ¬© Tappytoon‚Ñ¢ - All rights reserved.
descriptionHTML:
Discover top comics and novels on Tappytoon‚Ñ¢ - your official source
for original manhwa, manga and webtoon by top creators!


Featuring latest chapters of popular action comics such as Solo Leveling, The Skeleton Soldier, I'm the
Max-Level Newbie, and fantasy comics like I Became the Mother of the Evil Male Lead, Born
as the Second Daughter,, The Beloved Little Princess, I Woke Up as the Ugly Duckling.

Catch up on romantic bestsellers Ashtarte, The Empress Wants To Avoid the Emperor,The Broken Ring: This Marriage Will Fail Anyway, and Popular new romance releases such as I Became the Tyrant's Dishonest
Adviser and The Villainess Empress's Attendant.
If you are looking for BL, Tappytoon has it all.
Cherry Blossoms After Winter, DEAR. DOOR , My Darling Signed Inand How to Snag an Alpha are all available for your reading.

Webnovel adaptations Who Made Me a Princess and What It Takes to be a Villainess are also here.

Tappytoon's comic and manhwa collection spans across action, romance, fantasy, BL and drama. There's comics for everyone.
Don't forget to check out our webnovel collection.

you won't find anywhere else.

summary: Read comics, manhwa, manga & novels Official webtoons with daily updates

scraped_reviews.content: There are good stories, but it is heavily money based. They do allow you to accumulate coins by watching ads, which is nice. HOWEVER, the most recent update of the ads makes the ads longer! Takes me 30 minutes to watch 30 ads!?!? It was 10-15 minutes for 30 ads yesterday! Not only that, when the ads are done, I have a hard time closing them. I also get a 10-15 second "please download" ad (2nd ad popup after initial 30+ second ad). These ads are insanely long. Not worth watching for 10 coins...

The options to watch ads for coins doesn't work sometimes and a lot of the other options to get free coins are either sketchy surveys or signing up for stuff that want your information or don't even work. Also some of the translations are bad and even some of the better translated comics have some spelling errors, poorly translated sentences and some wrong pronoun uses which when you are paying between 10 to 60 dollars per comic you shouldn't be getting mistakes you'd expect from fan translatio

You do have to pay, but that should be expected with this type of app. And this app has a wide selection of wait until free series that lets you read nearly the entire comic. Good quality content, pretty large selection, easy to use and find whatever you're looking for. I do wish it had the option to delete purchases, sometimes I'll purchase a couple chapters and then decide it's not for me and its a nuisance having that cluttering my purchased section. Overall a really good reading app!

I like this app - there are some comics available for free everyday (Solo Leveling! So good!), and others you read with points. Mature (18+) content is only available through the website but once you add it to your library, you can access/read it in the app like anything else. The free points system is great too. Either play games or watch ads. You can get 300 points every hour with ads which is fine by me as that's typically the cost of one chapter. Daily check-ins also give points.

Prices have skyrocketed since I've been on this app. It used to be that you could watch 30 ads and unlock one 300 point episode, with the ability to do so every hour. Now, you don't even get to keep the stuff you pay for with your own cash for more than a year or so. Frequently, the quality of the app has gone down; from refusing to load pages as you scroll to straight up refusing to let you read what you paid for with your money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your honest review. We will continue to strive toward providing excellent content and service. We'd love to hear your thoughts on how we can improve your experience. Please feel free to contact us at -- support@tappytoon.com.

scraped_reviews.content: there are stories missing whole parts leading to the story becoming completely incoherent, and it's almost impossible to get any help with it. Prices going up; promotion, and refills going down. It's getting worse. It does have some of the novel versions, but I'm on the fence on if it's worth the price or not. It's not. Half the stories are terribly translated in the novels, and the comics can be missing whole sections.

I've just started reading and I love the comics. But the only problem is that the episodes are so expensive like 300 points or 3 tickets. I Mean 100 points is better to be honest. Also for earning points by downloading/playing games, so much things to do, its so complicated but then on the other you get a high amount of points. But it's still really frustrating since there are many things to do after downloading the game. It's like a bucket list of things to do in your life.

The cost is too high for me to use this app. I understand paying for content but it's hard to know in 3 chapters if it'll be worth paying to finish a story. Most seem like they'd be ~$10 but some are far more expensive. I'd be willing to spend more money if I felt I was getting a better deal. I pay for webtoons because a little goes a long way. The same amount doesn't go very far with tappytoons so I can't justify spending on this app. I hope this is a sign the artists are well compensated.

I got pulled in from an interesting add. Read the trial chapters and enjoyed the setup for the story. Then hit the wall of "pay to read". I wanted to go for the videos since making purchases like that isn't something I can easily do often. But to get so little from watching a video, it would take forever to open up one chapter. I just wanted to enjoy a good story, but that really isn't worth it. It's too bad, but it is what it is. Will be uninstalling.

Good comics, but super expensive to be able to read more than a few chapters at a time. You get points by videos (too much time for too little points) or by downloading other games with a ton of conditions that you have to meet. There are daily free chapters but the series included are limited. Wish the site had a monthly subscription or something that would be more affordable than the current system. I understand supporting the site/ the artists, but there has to be a better solution.

Not many genres though, all the comics have pretty great art, downside is its more expensive- the subscription could have better benefits. For free, you can read one chapter of your comics every 24hrs. Additionally, there's two options to get coins for free, ads being one of them. One chapter is 30 ads, take that as you will. Edit: on second glance, the selection size is pretty decent.

For the most part this is a good comic app. However, I've had problems with my account where I tried logging back in with the same email and it made me create a new account. So now I have two accounts (on same email), and on one I've purchased a lot of episodes for different comics and the other only a few. Now its annoying having to try and switch between the two to get the one I want and trying to use my points on the right account. In other words, it's just really disappointing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, please email support@tappytoon.com with your email and/or nickname so we can solve your account issues. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Although I'm glad that we could get points for free offers, you get a small amount of points, compared to the difficulty of the task. I mean, you get like 5,000 points for doing A LOT of lessons for the game "Obey Me!". It's very infuriating, the app Tapas has the same concept, but you get a good amount of rewards. It's very annoying how you need 300 points for a chapter, and 3 tokens for the same one. Not all of us have the money and time to spend on this app.

The stories are great,the artwork is good and there are plenty of offers for getting free points. However, I've completed several of these offers spending days and sometimes weeks to get to the required level only to not receive my points once back in Tappytoons. Fix this issue with the points and I can see giving more stars. Until then there isn't much point in me having this app.

The stories are good, yeah, but way too expensive. 300 points per chapter, you have to watch 30 ads to make even a single chapter accessible for free, with no other way to earn them or have them refilled. I'd rather pay a subscription to be able to read as much as i want than be constantly buying points. Personally, this keeps me from being truly invested in the app.

Not worth the time to download unless you're willing to spend money. The videos for free points is a joke since each chapter is 300 points and one video gives you 10 points each, up to 30 (300 points total). Takes forever to get through them. Free points per video needs to be increased and other methods of getting free points, other than trying apps, needs to be introduced. Risking my device to download apps I'm not interested in isn't worth it.

App has a pretty good selection of comics. My main issue is that there's not a "my purchases" section. If I'm trying to check on series I have been buying chapters for, I have to dig through my history or go deep into menus to see what I spent money on. It'd be nice to have a "purchased series" section with comics that I bought at least one chapter from on the landing page.

I would normally rate it 5 stars, but there's a single flaw that really ruins the app. First of all, it has AMAZING stories, easy to read text and the menus are easy to learn. Its practically perfect....except the buying of points to keep reading. I understand that you need to make money. But making you pay for 3 point per episode only shows people that you want to drain their wallets. (50+ episodes, and each costs 3 points.... that adds up eventually btw). WEBTOONS did it better. Just saying.

Dont get me wrong, the stories are amazing, and so is the art, When i wanted points so i could skip the wait, i went and downloaded the games. I completed the levels when the rewards weren't granted. i had to contact support and show proof. I was apparently not eligible for those points after showing proof of completion. So apparently, the only choice is to buy the points that are honestly stupid. Its ridiculous.

I do enjoy the comics, although it's tedious to watch about 30 mins worth of ads to get enough points to unlock one chapter. I wish the chapters costed 100 points rather than 300 so you'd get to read a few more. Now, for some reason I can watch the ads to get free points but I am not receiving any points at all. It was working fine yesterday but it's being weird now. It's says 0/30 ads even though I've restarted/shut down my phone and uninstalled the app, it's frustrating to say the least. Help?

There are some really great stories on here. I admittedly paid for coins to read, but you run out quickly and watching 30 ads an hour just for one chapter isn't a thing for me. I don't know about others but I enjoy reading more than one chapter at a time, especially if i'm enjoying the story. This app needs a free coins thing. Like a reward for coming back every day or some reason to keep this app. Because as much as I want to keep reading I don't want to spend more money to do it.

The app has many great stories. I just read one and I was immediately roped into the story. But I have to pay to read the entire thing, meaning I have to pay for individual chapters. It's the same for Webnovel and Mangatoon. Webtoons allows you to read chapters for free, of course you can use fastpass to advance but there are drawbacks for that. I recommend Webtoons, if you want to read free chapters without having pay for them individually. You have to wait a week for a new, but well worth it

I read the first few chapters free and enjoyed it. That's when my issue started. In order to keep going I had to buy tokens. Paying and supporting the artist isn't an issue for me but when you calculate the overall cost per chapter it runs roughly $0.28 to $0.37, depending on which token package you get. With that in mind, it's hard to determine cost if the comic isn't complete and you don't know how many total chapters there will be. Wish you could pay a set price for a complete story instead

Up until recently I was reading two "time till free" comics, all of a sudden I cant read one anymore even though the time till free period is up. Wish there had been some sort of notice that I could no longer read it in that manner or that something in the system changed. There also seems to be no way to directly contact Tappytoon (at least that I could easily find) regarding this issue.

This app is a purchase as you go, cool knowing that you have to earn or buy. My issue is the prices! I want to read my series. It takes 303 plus tokens...that's roughly $50? If I'm dropping that much I'd want the physical copy. There are no bundles for buying complete seasons and the free actions require download and play of random games. I'm not cool with downloading random stuff to my phone. I love the story I found and am even willing to pay, but it's just too expensive for online content.

I love the stories on this app, but the problem I have is with the points. There have been times where I've completed tasks, and the points never came. My most recent problem went throught customer service, and after about 5-7 days, I received a response saying that my points have been added to my account. When I checked my account, the pints weren't added! Also, there is no easy way to contact tapjoy about the problem, so you'll just be left without the points!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, did you directly contact our offerwall partner Tapjoy on this issue? If you have already contacted them directly by going to Free Points > Click on top left corner > Reward Status > Opened > Click on offer > Request support. and got a response but no points, please reach out to support@tappytoon.com and we will help you out further!

scraped_reviews.content: Most of the reviews are accurate. There isn't much you can read for free before you have to spend money to continue reading a story. And out of the three stories I sampled, they all felt rushed; like some info was cut out and the rest pushed together. The chapters are also too short, like maybe a five paragraph essay's length. All in all, not worth spending money on. You'd come out better actually buying physical books.

I mean the app is good and I like the formatting, but pretty much all of the chapters are locked and the only way to unlock them is with tokens and points. The only way to get theese tokens/points is by purchasing them. I would give this app 5 stars if not for this small detail. It would be great if they would add a feature that gives you points for daily check-ins, time online, watching adds, ect. it doesn't seem like to much to ask, but I'd rather not waste all my money. :\

Love the content, HATE THE PLATFORM. Points are too expensive, there aren't many opportunities to gain free points. The offers they give you revolve around spending money for less than 20 points... Which doesn't make sense because you might as well buy the actual points than to buy something random. The free games they offer can take HOURS to reach the levels they set and the reward in return is less than 200 points. It's such a headache, Webtoon is way better and affordable w/ better deals.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for leaving your honest opinion. We will aim to provide more opportunities for users to access high quality comics in the future. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app! Unlike (a certain app), you can wait for the next episode, instead of buying coins. You obviously get the first few chapters free, to see if you like the story of course. And, you can watch 30 ads for 300 coins, per hour! That's 24 episodes a day! I havn't had it long, so I dont know if there's any bugs, but 5 stars still seems excessive. I would like the point system to be fixed, sometimes you dont get points even after you do what the action says

They've got a lovely variety & a nice range of genres, but the prices keep rising & I KNOW it's not fully going to the authors of the stories (Some are friends), if it was, I would be much less annoyed by the prices. As I'm a big fan of keeping art made by actual people paid. It's getting harder & harder to justify spending the money for the stories, since it's lining the app creators pockets instead of the writers & artists, which makes me a bit sad. Getting harder to find good reading apps.

Rather than going with a monthly subscription, the developers decided to go with a point purchase system. Sure, you can watch ads for points. Watch 30 ads and you get enough points to read 1 chapter. And you can only watch 30 ads an hour. Basically you must watch 15 min of ads to read a single chapter. This is an app with a wide variety of comics, if you have hundreds of dollars to throw around. For $95 you can read almost 300 chapters. Hope you aren't interested in reading more than 2 series.

This app is only worth it if you're willing to spend money or do lots of work to read these stories. The stories are nice, but only the first 3 chptrs are free. After that, you need to use 3 tokens each to unlock the chptrs. If you do not want to buy tokens, then you have to use equal amt of points (1 token=100 points). You can get pts by watching ads (1 ad=10 points) or by completing offers. Offers require you download and play other games to get points. Lots of work.

I was excited to try the app, but then I got it and found that I needed to pay per chapter after 1-3 free ones. I didn't know in app purchases was not optional after a cerTain point. If you have the money to support the artists, then this is a great app wirh stories that are drawn beautifully (from my quick go through anyways). Unfortunately paying per chapter adds up & there is no way that I found to earn any tokens/points. They give discounts for starters. Sign up is easy too.

Love this app! Only thing I hate is that when you read a story only the first few episodes are free. Then the easiest way to unlock the next episodes is to download certain games and play those games and reach this or that level to gain points. Otherwise, you need to pay with cash for points. I wish the stories are entirely free, and you didn't have to use points to unlock the next episode.

First time purchasing a 1 year subscription to this type of app, assuming that I could read however much I can, but it turns out you are still LIMITED. The first 3 episodes are relatively free, but afterward, you need points to UNLOCK more episodes. I am disappointed with this. They don't even give you enough points to unlock one full season, at least. Please look elsewhere.

I love all the comics, but I'm disappointed in the app itself. Having us watch 30 ads for a very small amount of coins, it's only enough to read one chapter and if you wanted to continue reading without watching ads. You'll have to buy tokens which are so much more expensive. Compared to Webtoon and Webcomics, this is more like a scam. If I wanted to pay so much just to read I would just go to Barnes and Nobles for good quality books and manga. Very disappointed, such amazing comics are here.

Love reading the 2 I invested on! The only reason I gave 4 stars is because logging off the app for a good 6 months and expecting cost to be the same, its not. Even though prices went up, the amount of tokens are more. I understand people being furious there's no ad option to read for free (example WebComics) or wait every week to read a new chapter(WebToon). Trust me y'all, when I made my first purchase, my soul was crushed. Once you find a good story to read, you want to read more about it.

This app is a money trap. You can read the first three chapters of a story, but then you have to unlock them. This means either spending real money for the chapters ($5 got me like 10 pages of content, WAY less bang for your buck than, say, paying for an ebook from Amazon) OR watching ads for "free points". I watched almost 20 ads to unlock a chapter. Almost 10 minutes for 30 seconds of enjoyment. The other option is doing "offers" which means downloading other apps that are just as terrible.

The webcomics here are GREAT! I don't spend real money on any other app cuz...I'd go broke before I even have a chance to earn a penny. They have sales too so that is good to use but not enough sales go through for the series I am currently reading. TT-TT But it is a great new way to introduce someone to new series. It is best if you purchase anything from them through the PC and Android devices. They keep in sync while Apple devices can only be used on Apple devices, not even the website works.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your encouragement and supporting the hard work of artists and creators! Any chapters you unlock here are synced to other platforms. Tokens are separate for Apple, hope that clarifies it for you! -- info[@]tappytoon.com

scraped_reviews.content: I have spent probably around 50 bucks on this app already and I can tell you that it's definitely pretty expensive. A whole book at a store can be around 12-15 dollars. A whole comic here would cost 30-40 dollars depending on how long the story continues. I reccomend giving a way for people to earn points, like by reading more chapters etc. Also, if you could add a way to look at all the comics at once, that'd be helpful. Either way I personally love this app, has made given me a lot of joy. :)

The most expensive reading/comic app I have ever come across. Only the first three chapters of any story are available. There is a way to earn free coins, however it equates to 15 minutes of ads for one chapter, limited to once an hour. (Other apps I've used allow one chapter per 30 second ad.) You can also play other apps for points but you need to complete at least three of those per chapter. It's a shame because the few stories I looked at seemed very interesting.

Insane cost. The first comic I opened was fantastic. I would have loved to binge read it, but it costs 300 points to unlock a chapter. That's the equivalent of having to watch 30 ads to unlock one chapter. That's just nuts. I am all for supporting the creators, and I love having the option to watch ads to pay for content. But compared to most other websites and apps, this is way above the norm.

The comics are decent, the practices are not. There are a few comics that will become free with time, while there are others you have to give points to or they never will. Points can be earned for free 10 at a time for watching videos, more for deals. But new chapters all appear to be 300 points so...painfully not worth it. Gorgeous artwork on some of these, but just not worth the hassle in my opinion.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We hope you understand that all comics are the hard work of creators that we believe deserve to be rewarded for their talent and hopefully you'll join us in the mission to support them so they can continue their awesome work in the future. We will do our best to provide opportunities so you'll be able to access high quality comics. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: The comics on the app are amazing, and I'd gladly pay to read them, though I wish ads did replace the charge. The problem is they charge you 300 coins each chapter. You don't buy them either you can only read them for a limited time. There is no option to watch ads for coins and 1k of them cost 2.99 I think. You unlock episodes for 2 days so if you want to read through a decently sized comic and then try to reread it in more depth after you'll have to pay.

I really would've liked this app because the little cat icon is cute, so is the design and the comics featured are interesting and I love them. The one thing I don't like is the fact that we have to pay or wait god knows how long for an event to get points? I think maybe there should be other ways to earn points like daily logins or every time you read [x] chapters. But other than that, it's a good app if you are willing to pay to unlock each chapter after the third. There are no ads too :D

I don't like the token option. Okay, I understand the very talented artist need to get paid, but there are other ways other than forcing readers to pay. I would keep this app if I had the option of watching an ad for every chapter I want to read. Rather than just pay out of pocket, I rather just pay with my time. Whats the point of creating good content if no one can read and enjoy it. Please add more options to gain tokens! As for now I am uninstalling sadly.

I think this app is decent but it's more expensive than the other apps with a similar business model & the subscription service is honestly a waste of time. I would rather pay $9.99 for the coins than pay $4.99 month & I only get to read 14ish chapters a month. If you want to read a story with 25 chapters, you will still need to pay for coins on top of the monthly payments. Why? And that 30 coin login bonus is nothing. I fully support paying artist but this is ridiculous.

The stories themselves are okay; that's where the positive ends. You can read 1 free chapter of some books a day and you only have a very limited choice of books that allow that. If you do manage to find a free book you like and are okay reading it 1 chapter a day, you can only read up until the most recent 10 chapters posted. This app is good for people who want to spend a lot of their money, but honestly, there are much better, chaper, comic apps, like webtoons or webnovel.

It's a pretty good webcomic app. Don't buy the currency through the app though because you'll end up paying extra taxes. Spend the extra time to go through a web browser so you save money. Lastly, it only makes sense to follow a comic that actually piques your interest. If you don't see anything, despite my five star review, skip the app entirely.

title: MetaMask - Crypto Wallet
description:
MetaMask is the world‚Äôs most secure and flexible crypto wallet. Trusted by over 100 million users to buy, sell, and swap digital assets, our industry-leading security protects every move you make.


Get more out of crypto
‚Äì Buy, sell, swap tokens directly in your wallet
‚Äì Trade perps
‚Äì Get MetaMask Rewards points
‚Äì Earn passive income from your assets
‚Äì Discover the decentralized web

scraped_reviews.content: I use a sam sung tablet. every time I reduce the window, the app resets and you have to sign back in and redo all the steps to get where you were! sometimes it duplicates transactions! this app is very time consuming, especially if you're training and taking screenshots! it will not give you enough time to get codes from email and get back in time to enter it! it's not uncommon to have to do it 12 to 15 times! I set up another device to check emails!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You can change the "autolock" timer from Settings (gear icon) > Security and Privacy > Auto-lock. (or even turn if off completely) If you need help: https://support.MetaMask.io > 'Start a Conversation' button. The bot will ask a few questions.

scraped_reviews.content: I had a hard time creating an account. I entered a password twice and it told me it was good. But the Continue button was disabled. It took a long time to figure out the problem: good was not good enough! It had to be strong! The user friendly thing would to tell the user the reason why Continue was not enabled! When I went to buy ETH I was shocked to see that to buy $200 the fees were $19.96, almost 10%. Other wallets are much cheaper! Also, debit card is the only option. No ACH!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for this feedback, we are working to improve our app and will keep this in mind. Best, MetaMask team

scraped_reviews.content: It's good, when it works. Most of the time it is super slow, even if I clear all the cookies and data and even completely do an account reset. I read all over the place that would fix it, sometimes it does, sometimes it doesn't. Easy to use app, when and if it work Edit: I deleted the wallet and resigned in using my recovery phrases. That seemed to clear everything up. It's working fine now
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey, thanks for writing a review. Sometimes, the app may be slow but such instances are rare. If it happens too often, please let us know at https://metamask.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new. We'll have things investigated.

scraped_reviews.content: Joined, got a bonus for joining, and about a month later miraculously the money was somehow transferred out of my wallet, from a different device, when my phone was in my possession the whole time, and no one had access to my password or recovery. Pretty suspicious, glad I didn't put any more money into it. I'm sure it all would have been transferred aswell. If I could rate 0 stars I would seeing how it's deceptive practice.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We try to prevent scammers from harming our users, but we can't stop everything users may choose to do with their wallets. https://metamask.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/12339813400091-Token-pre-sale-scams

scraped_reviews.content: There's been an issue with using uniswap for a while. Nobody is talking about this??? Wallet connect is the only way to connect and it constantly has a warning pop up, "This website has been blocked from automatically opening an external application." The app crashes and closes right after. I often can't make a swap on uniswap. Phone (Pixel 6) isn't rooted or running graphene and it's up to date.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Reach out to our helpdesk: https://support.MetaMask.io and click the blue 'Start a Conversation' button. The bot will ask a few questions then get you connected.

scraped_reviews.content: Trust the reviews. This app looks nice, but is terrible for both beginners and those experienced with crypto. One big issue is that, by default, it uses a tiny gas price that is way too small for the transaction to actually get processed, and its easier to get in a situation where your crypto is effectively locked, potentially forever. (speaking from experience) They really need to fix this

Somehow it's even worse than the browser extension! I didn't believe that could even be done! The only reason I even use MetaMask is because it's the only one seemingly able to be used with every web3 website. If there were another choice, I'd jump ship instantly! Crashes CONSTANTLY! It spontaneously will ask you to completely recover your wallet with your recovery phrase! (Which makes me super uncomfortable) and it's browser is among the worst experiences I've ever endured!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are sorry that you're having issues with the app. Could you please uninstall the app and try again with an updated version? Please make sure you have correctly backed up your secret recovery phrase prior to doing this. If the issue continues, please reach out to us support.metamask.io

scraped_reviews.content: This is the worst wallet ever. I can't buy eth here because the app keeps saying I can't go over a 500 daily limit, but seeing as I haven't bought anything today, why is it limiting me? There is no option to pay with a bank account even though the app says it accepts it, it only gives you the option of using a debit/credit card with even HIGHER LIMITS. Gas fees are HIGH and many people complain about losing money due their buggy system.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are sorry that you're having issues with the app. Thank you for letting us know. Our Developers will look into this issue. Kindly include a description of the issue you are facing, your Android version, and your app version. We will investigate immediately & solve the issue. Can you write to us at support.metamask.io.

scraped_reviews.content: It's metamask and it's mobile. So far, so good. It's easy to switch between the Main and Test netwotks for ETH. It's probably better to create a separate wallet rather than import with this app, if you use the browser extension as well. They currently prevent exporting the seed phrase when asking you to back it up, which is kind of annoying and seems counter-intuitive.

SLOW, buggy, clunky and unintuitive, you can tell the developers just didn't care. I've never been this infuriated by an app before. The keyboard will constantly hide the field you're trying to type in. When making a purchase through coinbase, you have to enter every single detail every time, and this app isn't compatible with your Google Wallet, so you can't use that to auto fill. I attempted to bridge from one network to another, got charged a gas fee, and they never completed the bridge.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We don't charge gas fees. Reach out to our helpdesk so we can get some additional details about these issues: https://support.MetaMask.io and click the 'Start a Conversation' button. The bot will ask a few questions then get you connected.

scraped_reviews.content: Really needs to improve BSC compatibility. Tries to set gas prices way too high automatically for most transactions. Doesn't let you set them yourself by default. If you're in a hurry, you might process the transaction without thinking about it, costing you more than what's being moved in the transaction itself. Absolutely unacceptable. Also doesn't open new browser windows unless it's the default browser app, apparently?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Joshua! Thanks for the feedback. We have looked into it and are looking to fix gas price estimation for BSC in our next release in about 2-3 weeks. Thanks for your patience! We hope you will upgrade to the new version and revise your rating.

scraped_reviews.content: I tried using MetaMask for handling crypto and found it pretty easy to get the hang of. The setup felt secure, with clear steps to back up the recovery phrase and protect the wallet. The interface is clean and simple, and navigating through wallets and transactions wasn‚Äôt complicated. It‚Äôs a great choice if you‚Äôre getting into web3 or need a trusted wallet on the go.

doesn't update on time, there are coins that drop for a few minutes the go up and everytime it drops I have to wait for meta mask to update the drop and by the time it does, the coin is up again. making it hard to buy that coin. it takes time swapping coins thus I lost money through that and it's slow when using. it's just so frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Reach out to our helpdesk: https://support.MetaMask.io > 'Contact Support' button. The bot will ask a few questions then get you connected.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using MetaMask since my first Ethereum trade, and it's only gotten better. As a self-custody wallet trusted by over 100 million users worldwide, it gives you full control without the risks of centralized exchanges. No major hacks in its history, thanks to advanced security like seed phrase backups and now seamless Apple/Google account integration for easier setup. What I love most: the browser extension and mobile app sync perfectly, supporting dozens of chains and thousands of tokens
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Glad to hear you're enjoying those features. (was pretty tricky to build a sync function that maintained our very strict security protocols. Security is always our first consideration) If there's a feature you'd like to see us add, or think of something we could be doing even better, let us know: https://community.MetaMask.io

scraped_reviews.replyContent: MM should autodetect most tokens, but there's a couple ways to check your exact balances, JIC: https://portfolio.metamask.io is probably the easiest, but you can also check the block explorer. (https://blockscan.com can search many different chains at once. Pretty handy) If you need help: https://support.MetaMask.io > 'Contact Support' buttons.

title: Angry Birds 2
description:
Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start the fun slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, climb the leaderboards, gather in clans, collect hats, take on challenges, and play fun events in all-new game modes. Evolve your team and show your skills in this exciting Angry Birds game !

Get to know all of the iconic Angry Birds characters and experience the fun gameplay that has captured the hearts of millions of players.

Features:

‚óè DAILY CHALLENGES. Have a minute? Complete a daily challenge and earn some quick rewards.
‚óè LEVEL UP your characters with feathers and up their scoring power. Build the ultimate flock!
‚óè JOIN A CLAN to take down the pigs with friends and players around the world.
‚óè COMPETE in the ARENA. Compete with other players for some friendly bird flinging fun and prove who is the best.
‚óè COLLECT SILLY HATS. Collect hats with different fun themes to level up your flock‚Äôs fashion game and take part in special events.
‚óè IMPRESS THE MIGHTY EAGLE in special challenges in Mighty Eagle‚Äôs Bootcamp and earn coins to use in his exclusive shop.
‚óè LOTS OF LEVELS. Play hundreds of levels with more added in regular updates and limited time events.
‚óè LEADERBOARDS. Compete with your friends and other players and prove who is the best on the global leaderboards.
‚óè CHOOSE YOUR BIRD. Choose which bird to put in the slingshot and defeat the pigs with strategy!
‚óè MULTI-STAGE LEVELS. Play fun, challenging levels with multiple stages ‚Äì just watch out for Boss Pigs!
‚óè FREE to download! --- Angry Birds 2 is completely free to play. Although Angry Birds 2 can be downloaded for free, there are optional in-app purchases available.


 ---
When playing this game, Rovio will offset the carbon footprint caused by the device‚Äôs energy consumption.

descriptionHTML:
Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start the fun slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, climb the leaderboards, gather in clans, collect hats, take on challenges, and play fun events in all-new game modes. Evolve your team and show your skills in this exciting Angry Birds game !

Get to know all of the iconic Angry Birds characters and experience the fun gameplay that has captured the hearts of millions of players.

Features:

‚óè DAILY CHALLENGES. Have a minute? Complete a daily challenge and earn some quick rewards.
‚óè LEVEL UP your characters with feathers and up their scoring power. Build the ultimate flock!
‚óè JOIN A CLAN to take down the pigs with friends and players around the world.
‚óè COMPETE in the ARENA. Compete with other players for some friendly bird flinging fun and prove who is the best.
‚óè COLLECT SILLY HATS. Collect hats with different fun themes to level up your flock‚Äôs fashion game and take part in special events.
‚óè IMPRESS THE MIGHTY EAGLE in special challenges in Mighty Eagle‚Äôs Bootcamp and earn coins to use in his exclusive shop.
‚óè LOTS OF LEVELS. Play hundreds of levels with more added in regular updates and limited time events.
‚óè LEADERBOARDS. Compete with your friends and other players and prove who is the best on the global leaderboards.
‚óè CHOOSE YOUR BIRD. Choose which bird to put in the slingshot and defeat the pigs with strategy!
‚óè MULTI-STAGE LEVELS. Play fun, challenging levels with multiple stages ‚Äì just watch out for Boss Pigs!
‚óè FREE to download! --- Angry Birds 2 is completely free to play. Although Angry Birds 2 can be downloaded for free, there are optional in-app purchases available.


---

summary: Play the Angry Birds game enjoyed by millions of players every day!

scraped_reviews.content: Got back into this after playing the originals. I used to play these games for hours waiting to get tired while laying in bed. Won't be doing that with this game. You only get so many lives before the game forces you to buy more. You lose a life even when completing a level? i understand losing a life if you fail but come on. This is just plain greed. You get maybe 15 minutes of gameplay before you have to spend some sort of in game currency. Disappointed is an understatement.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, Lt Reaper. It's clear that the gameplay experience hasn‚Äôt met your expectations. Many players echo your thoughts on life limits and in-game currency. Your insights are important to us, and we‚Äôre dedicated to enhancing the experience. We appreciate you sharing your thoughts! - The AB2 Team

scraped_reviews.content: The game is rough. Some levels are made to be damn near unbearable because they desperately want you to spend money in their shop. And oh my god the popups. Every time I enter the main menu, whether I'm just booting up the game or I'm changing game modes, I never get anything less than four popups in a row advertising literally every aspect of the shop. And to make it worse there are ads every couple minutes. If you're thinking of playing this out of nostalgia for the original, don't do it
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback about the challenging levels and the frequency of popups and ads. It's important for us to hear how these aspects affect your experience. Your insights are valuable, and we‚Äôre committed to creating a better environment for all players. Thank you for sharing your thoughts! - The AB2 Team

scraped_reviews.content: this pay to play nonsense is out of control. you now require spending points to play the game? The first pop-up I see is a "sale" for a $99 package? Who in their right mind would spend $99 on Angry Birds? The spin to win nerver works. I watch the ad and it never registers. I can't just play the game without being bombarded by 5 ads and pop-ups in 10 seconds. that's insane and you should feel bad.

scraped_reviews.replyContent: Adam, we appreciate your feedback regarding the ads and sound issues. Your insights are truly valuable to us, and we‚Äôre committed to enhancing your experience. scraped_reviews.content: Super fun game completely undermined by micro transactions. Even if you are WINNING you can run out of credits and have to wait or pay. You can watch an ad for credits but that involves literally playing another game and being sent to the app store. and constant prompts like "wanna pay $10 for a hat for the bird?" Insane. But a shame since it's so fun. If it wasn't so dead set against me progressing for free I would give it five stars
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Derek, thank you for your feedback about the game experience! It‚Äôs wonderful to hear you find it fun! We value your thoughts on in-game purchases and progression, and we‚Äôre committed to making improvements. Your insights truly help us grow. Wishing you many more enjoyable moments! - The AB2 Team

scraped_reviews.content: I've been playing this game for a long time. to call it addicting is an understatement. I've spent more money on this game than I care to admit. that being said, what I'm going to say next holds considerable weight; first off, the space theme has got to go. it's not fun, it's not enjoyable, it's not good. it is hot garbage. second, as others have said, the popups advertising the aspects of the game and the shop is unnecessary. I know how the game works, and I don't need the popups telling me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Benjamin, your feedback truly matters to us, and we appreciate your dedication to the game. scraped_reviews.content: Angry Birds 2 looks and plays great- easily one of the best-designed mobile games out there. The gameplay is smooth, the visuals are top-tier, and it's genuinely fun. But once you get far enough, the random bird draw and sudden difficulty spikes make progress feel more about grinding (or paying) than skill. It starts to feel like the game is designed to keep you playing-or spending. Still worth playing, just know what you're in for.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Chris R, thank you for your thoughtful insights on the game's design and gameplay! We truly value your feedback about the random bird draw and difficulty spikes. Your input helps us improve the experience for everyone. Stay tuned for our updates here: https://rov.io/AB2-Updates. Wishing you great adventures ahead! - The AB2 Team

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be one of my go to games, mainly played on my HP laptop. Never had any problems - until the newest update. I've invested hours of time playing Angry Birds 2, and roughly $12,000.00 over the years. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling the game, and yet the problems are still there! Way too many bugs that no one seems to care about, because they still are there. I have to X off the game, and go back to it after every level. I just ran the update on my phone. FIX THE BUGS!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dave S., we truly value your loyalty and the time you've spent with our game! Thank you for sharing your thoughts! Wishing you all the best! - The AB2 Team

scraped_reviews.content: Game deleted over half of my progress, collectables and levels just by signing in to Facebook. Never had an issue before this, customer support won't contact me back. And the ads are ridiculous, making you interact with them before the option to skip is given. Rovio used to be so much better. Give an ad free option.

scraped_reviews.content: This is an alright sequel to the first one, but it could be better. I do like the levels. They are creatively designed and are just challenging enough.
