It's TOO MUCH INTERRUPTION! Then, the levels get hard. You need to use multiple birds (so you run out). And sometimes you need special birds that you would have to spend money on. I uninstalled it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Michael, we truly appreciate your feedback! Your insights are invaluable in helping us enhance the game for everyone. We‚Äôre committed to making your experience better, and we hope to bring you more enjoyment in the future. Thank you for sharing your thoughts! - The AB2 Team

scraped_reviews.content: most part of this game is ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!!! So much detail and characters styles and abilities, awesome amount of hat sets and cool events, cool graphics etc. but the reason I gave this game 4 stars is Beacouse some levels are literally rigged! I mean some levels, my only issue is that some levels are so hard and rigged, overall the game is amazing. Highly recommended!

This game CONSTANTLY crashes on me or just after I complete a task or level. Somehow, it counts against me as a failed attempt and no credit during clan events, leagues, and training. Then I have to wait several hours to try again. I already got kicked out of a clan for "not participating" i have a Samsung s24+ with plenty of space and few apps. This problem has been going on for weeks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate you sharing your experience with the game crashing and its impact on your progress. It's disheartening to hear about your challenges during events and clan participation. Your feedback is important to us as we work on enhancing the experience for everyone. Thank you for your patience! - The AB2 Team

scraped_reviews.content: The game is getting expensive, it's harder to recieve hats during events. It's fun but would be nice to earn more stuff easily, it's cost so much to get new levels to advance to get hats how is it 60 to continue then going to 180 like what these games are becoming cash cows and the ads drive me insane 2 min long ad just to get 10 gems come on now can't win without hats but can't get them I still play but it sucks now
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback, Cee Cee. We'll definitely take into consideration your concerns about the difficulty in earning hats and the cost of advancing levels. We'll work on making the game more enjoyable and rewarding for you. üì® We're here to help! Reach out to us: https://rov.io/support_ab2 - The AB2 Team

scraped_reviews.content: As a collector, I love this game, but I really hate how you can't just play levels whenever you want, you have to wait 30 minutes or so to play a level after you have played 6 levels, I understand this kind of system if you can disable it for a fee, but unlike games that typically do this, it's not an option, so what's the point? Having this system doesn't generate profit, so what is the point of it being implemented in the first place?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your passion for collecting and understand your concerns about the level access system. It can be disappointing when gameplay is limited. Your feedback is important, and we‚Äôre always looking to enhance the experience for players like you. Thank you for sharing your thoughts! - The AB2 Team

scraped_reviews.content: levels are fun but the developers dont care about the payers time whatsoever. theres so many stupid events and powerups and raffles and ads that you spend more time on the menu than actually playing. any time you fail a level theres about 10 seconds of animations or pigs laughing at you before you can even retry. its sometimes faster to just close and reopen the app than to sit through all the popup ads and animations. and you cant play offline because of the energy system.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback about the gameplay experience and the time spent on menus and animations. Your insights are important as we strive to create a better balance. We hope you continue to enjoy the fun levels and find moments of joy in the game! - The AB2 Team

scraped_reviews.content: Since last night I can not log into my account .I was in the middle of the game and gaining very good results and then suddenly logged me out, which it wasn't a very first time, it was happening often in the last 2-3 weeks ,But now it is not letting me log on. Very annoying and unfair. I couldn't convert my coins and use the other benefits as wasn't letting me to log on and lost these opportunities. Please make sure it is working properly. I have read from other people bad comments too.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Denis, we truly appreciate you sharing your experience. It can be tough when things don‚Äôt go as planned. Please try signing in with the service you linked, like Facebook or Google Play. Your feedback is invaluable, and we're working to enhance our system. Thank you for your understanding! - The AB2 Team

scraped_reviews.content: Birds locked , started the game today and all the favorite birds are locked! now have to pass levels and unlock keys to unlock them back up, this is very annoying and a long time fan of the game is now very frustrated with the game. I hope developers wake up and realize they have to take care of the game, people are playing for a long time and then all progress is erased!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Daria, we truly appreciate your long-standing support and recognize how disappointing it can be to encounter issues with the birds being locked and losing progress. Your feedback is invaluable to us, and we‚Äôre committed to improving your experience. Thank you for being a part of our community! - The AB2 Team

scraped_reviews.content: Played this game after a few years, seems like they are trying absolutely everything they can to just get you to pay for something. "Want more than just 15 mins of gameplay a day? For $3.49, you can extend that time for up to 15 more minutes!" The game also feels overstimulating, the amount of sound cues and shiny buttons feels overwhelming. Overall, this game has turned into a blatant "addict and money-grab", without even trying to hide it, and i'm pretty sure these responses are AI generated..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Zohair, thank you for your feedback! We‚Äôre committed to enhancing the gameplay experience and appreciate your insights on balancing game elements. Your thoughts on overstimulation are important to us, and we hope to create a more enjoyable experience for you. Thank you for sharing! - The AB2 Team

scraped_reviews.content: There's a pop up for a micro transaction after every level. When you start the game, there's several more. When you run out of energy (which happens frequently) there's more. It's honestly depressing that's where angry birds has gone. I miss the days of just starting the game and playing without being bombarded with this. I'd rather pay 99p and not have any of it.

scraped_reviews.content: Purchases disappear. Upgrades and uncaged birds degrade and get recaged. any progress made you have nothing to show for it. black pearls demolish. unlocked events become locked all over. I was having fun but my accomplishments keep fluctuating. Its no fun when you are at a higher level that requires an upgraded bird but cannot pass level bc your upgrades don't stick. also requires more birds but birds are recaged and downgraded making it impossible and ridiculous to play! there is too many flaws

scraped_reviews.content: I'm really enjoying the game so far, the levels are fun and everything looks really creative and well thought out but the one issue I have with this game is that whenever I try to log into the game it just freezes on the menu screen and nothing happens, and I end up having to uninstall the app and redownload it in order to continue playing the game, please fix it.

scraped_reviews.content: Angry Birds 2 is one of the best game sequels in the history of gaming.....The game has more better graphics than the previous one and has a addictive gameplay strategy....Sometimes the Daily Challenges are made hard with should not be that hard and King Pig Panic too which is sometimes easier and sometimes too much difficult to play without spending gems. All the 12 birds in the game are designed very beautifully....The best birds of the game are Terence and Melody.

title: JioSaavn - Music & Podcasts
description:
JioSaavn is India‚Äôs leading FREE music app, offering an extensive and exclusive library of 8 crore+ songs across 16 languages. Enjoy music you won‚Äôt find for free on any other app! Set your favourite tracks as JioTunes (callertunes) on your Jio number. Explore India‚Äôs top podcasts hosted by star podcasters!

With JioSaavn, experience India‚Äôs most versatile music and audio streaming app that serves multiple purposes:

Languages:
Hindi, English, Punjabi, Tamil, Telugu, Gujarati, Bengali, Marathi, Bhojpuri, Kannada, Malayalam, and more. Whatever your language preference, find it on JioSaavn!

Top Artists:
Explore every artist under the sun like Justin Bieber, Sid Sriram, Shreya Ghoshal, Jubin Nautiyal, Diljit Dosanjh, Ilaiyaraaja, Kumar Sanu, Michael Jackson, Alka Yagnik, and many more! Access music by your current favourites or all-time legends.

Genres:
Pop, Trending, Classic, EDM, Romantic, Bollywood Retro, Rock, Folk, Rap, Devotional, Remix, Indie to name a few! Find songs in all your favourite genres on JioSaavn.

Sing Along with Lyrics:
Sing along to super hits like ‚ÄòKesariya‚Äô, ‚ÄòAs It Was‚Äô, ‚ÄòPeaches‚Äô, ‚ÄòLe Le Aayi Coca Cola‚Äô, ‚ÄòSummer High‚Äô, ‚ÄòMayakama Kalakama‚Äô, ‚ÄòBimbilikki Pilapi‚Äô, ‚ÄòThe Warriorr‚Äô, ‚ÄòMacherla Niyojakavargam‚Äô, ‚ÄòMegharajana Raaga‚Äô, ‚ÄòSingara Siriye‚Äô, ‚ÄòThallumaala‚Äô, ‚ÄòDagdi Chawl 2‚Äô, ‚ÄòObosheshe‚Äô, ‚ÄòBas Kar Pagli‚Äô, ‚ÄòThe Villagers‚Äô, ‚ÄòKabootar‚Äô. Get accurate song lyrics and trivia in real time!

Podcasts & Shows:
Listen to India‚Äôs most popular podcasts and audio shows across multiple genres and languages. Discover your new favourite show and explore our curations in multiple genres such as ‚ÄòComedy‚Äô, ‚ÄòFilm & TV‚Äô, ‚ÄòReligion & Spirituality‚Äô, ‚ÄòIshq Wale Podcasts‚Äô, ‚ÄòCrime & Horror‚Äô, ‚ÄòHealth & Wellness‚Äô; along with shows in several languages like English, Hindi, Tamil, and more. Top-rated shows include ‚ÄòOn Purpose with Jay Shetty‚Äô, ‚ÄòPyaar Actually‚Äô, ‚ÄòWoice with Warikoo‚Äô, ‚ÄòGet Sleepy: Sleep Meditation and Stories‚Äô, and ‚ÄòZARA KHAUFF SE SUNO‚Äô.

Curated Playlists:
Experience our expertly curated playlists made for every mood and occasion. Listen to Now Trending Hindi, Best Of Romance Hindi, Fresh Tunes, Now Playing Pop, Gedi Shedi, Lub Ju, Pudhu Tunes, Top Kuthu, Kotha Tunes, Now Trending Telugu, Hosa Tunes, Premaloka, Puthuputhan Tunes, Now Trending Malayalam, Navin Tunes, Now Trending Marathi, Bhalobashar Gallery, Nrityer Taale, Now Trending Bhojpuri, Pyar Ke Jadu, Nava Tunes, Haryanvi Dance Hits. Tune in to addictive playlists in your language.

JioTunes:
Make your callers smile with a trending JioTune! Explore our selections of Top Hindi, Top English, Punjabi Hip-Hop, Tamil Romantic, and Top JioTunes 2022. Set JioTunes from your favourite films, whether Bollywood, Tollywood, or Kollywood. Entertain your callers with a peppy song before you pick up the phone!

Device Compatibility: Listen on Alexa, Chromecast, Google Home, Android Auto, Airplay, Sonos, and more!

JioSaavn Pro: Upgrade your music experience with JioSaavn Pro! Get access to extra features:
- Ad-free music
- Unlimited JioTunes
- Unlimited downloads
- High-quality audio
- Ringtone downloads
- Exclusive music and podcasts

Enjoy JioSaavn Pro with individual, family, or duo subscriptions on monthly and yearly plans. Sign up for a 30-day free trial and get access to JioSaavn Pro features for free! Jio users can listen to music and set JioTunes from JioSaavn on the MyJio app.

Looking for JioSaavn? You‚Äôre in the right place! Whether you search for jiosaavn, Jio Saavn, Jio Saavan, Jiosaavan, Jio saavan, jio tunes, or Jio caller tune, we‚Äôve got you covered!

Stay Connected:
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/jiosaavn
Follow us on Twitter and Instagram: @jiosaavn

Availability:
English content is currently available in India.
Content served in the US, UK, Canada, UAE, Australia, Singapore, Switzerland, Pakistan, New Zealand, Germany, Hong Kong, Netherlands, Malaysia, Norway, Maldives & South Africa.

scraped_reviews.content: Have been a Pro subscriber for nearly two years, and had no trouble with this app. Then I got a new phone, and can't access Pro. I messaged JioSaavn, and they were particularly unhelpful, just telling me to sign in with my Facebook account, which I had already done. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app three times to no avail. I synced my phone number this time, and that may be the problem, but there is no way for me to unsync it. Three days, and still can't access what I paid for.

It stop after every song. Sometimes you can't even finish one song. Sometimes I feel like I made a mistake by taking subscription. I could listened non stop song on free version. I know you guys would say delete the apps and reinstall the apps. Yes! I have done so many times still facing the same problem. Now I am thinking not to listen anymore . Because it so frustrating when it stops every few minutes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, please restart your device and try relaunching your app once again. If you still experience crashes, please write to us at feedback@jiosaavn.com with your login ID, device type, and OS version.

scraped_reviews.content: While, yes, the app does let you listen to many songs for free, a lot of songs are marked as "Pro Only" outside of India, but is available to listen for free in India. Additionally, it has some underdeveloped designs, such as when you want to listen to a podcast, it clears out your entire queue and replaces it with all the podcasts on a specific channel.

If i could give less i will . The app have been pausing a lot lately . While I drive while I workout. Its pointless to have it if I have to unpause it every 2 mins . I reached out to the customer service. All they can tell me is that there is an update available and please update. Which is really pissing me off because the app is upto date on my phone. I paid for a year's worth of service . I need a refund . I stopped using this app in July so I need a refund starting then. Worst music app.

scraped_reviews.content: Changing from 1 star to 2 stars! The app has improved a lot from where it was. Bluetooth connectivity has gotten better, and other connectivity got better too. But, playlist management, navigation is still weird. When you select something from recommended playlists, app doesn't always show the complete list of songs. When you try to download a playlist, not all songs download and the sync doesn't help either. App doesn't distinguish between downloads and cache which is really annoying.

scraped_reviews.content: App is good but the helpdesk doesn't responds to email. Additionally be careful if you take any subscription from them. Before your subscription expires they will deduct the money for next period without sending any notification & will not alert you on price change. I was shocked when they deducted twice the previous year fee, 2 days before expiry without notification. They also dont have an option to change/delete your payment method. So once you pay them, you are on their mercy. Be Careful!!

This app deserves 5 stars because of the good quality of the music and we can play as much songs as we want which is the main reason for me to love this app. Thankyou JioSaavn for giving us a new update of playing unlimited songs.

this is after an year of usage. 1. many songs aren't in the system. i remember jio app had almost all the songs but now it doesn't. 2. most worrying and bothersome. it starts playing the song all fine but after sometime and some nth song in the list, all of a sudden it starts lagging and bring jitter to the song which is very excruciating. and then that keeps continuing. and mind you, this is not a network issue as at the same place and same time, other apps play total normal.

I can understand if there is some problem in some songs but everytime it's happening with me. in the end it's not that good

Sound comes to active either if I pause and resume manually or if Android auto is active, the call comes and is completed. Worthless subscription. Moreover, no option to reach out to the customer care. I have to post this feedback here in hope that someone will take ownership.

I have a paid membership and I have been using jio saavan for the past 6 years, it's been a month and I am unable to play any songs. Once I click on the play button it keeps loading indefinitely. I have a good/stable internet connection as well so, that's not the issue. I tried to uninstall and install the app again but still no luck. I urge the Saavan team to help me fix the problem. I started to use other platforms as I am left with no other option. Please find a solution to this issue.

Disgusting, I don't know how and from which source they have charged me and renew my subscription without finishing the deadline day. I have been fooled by them because I was about to deactivate it. I am never gonna use it even if it's free. Tomorrow it's supposed to end the renewal of my subscription. They charged me and from which source they did but it shows its done and I don't even use this weird application.

Best , music listening app , yes Spotify is better than this but Spotify premium is very expensive and Spotify keep reminding about the premium. But on the other side jio savan premium is too cheap and don't remind everytime about the premium... I am having my playlist in Spotify , but we can play limited songs every day

everything is just the best but one thing, I can't find any option for lyrics in music player even when I play the most trendiest songs which should surely have lyrics, also I have enabled lyrics and annotations from the settings still.I couldn't find any video or article about lyrics option. Please if you can solve it i will give 5 stars!

Very poor song library with cheap Rip off Versions of Popular songs while originals are totally missing from the platform. This is like the Tik Tok of music you will find a number of remixes and other versions of the song but you won't ever find the OG song you are looking for . It's a shame that Jio Saavn instead of competing with international platforms like Spotify by improving their library listings is listing rip off variations and covers of songs in their library. Expected better 4rm Jio

The autoplay feature is very unstable and annoying for example after searching a song and playing it when I try to skip to next song there's no autoplay, sometimes there's. 2). I can't add any song to queue when in autoplay mode it's also a major thing to fix. 3). And lastly it doesn't grasp the type of song playing and just shuffles to any different genres, it's messes with the experience. Plz try to fix this.

first of all I'm using this for so long and on the very first day of using it, this app removed lyrics from all songs in my phone. And now since a month it's not showing me my playlists so I tried to clear my data and log back in. after that it removed my playlists and liked songs.

Despite good Internet speeds, app loads slowly, and songs keep buffering every 5 seconds. I can play the same song on YouTube ,and video loads smoothly at 1080p if not 2k. so why can't this app load a 128kbps song? also,limited skips and a push to subscribe every 3 songs,is diabolical. May the people behind monetisation, rot in hell or be incarnated as slimes.The app has a poor collection, doesn't work properly, shows non skip able ads,and they want to charge for this headache-as-a-service ?

title: Brilliant: Learn by doing
description:
Sharpen your math, data, and computer science skills in minutes a day with Brilliant. For professionals, students, and lifelong learners alike‚ÄîBrilliant is the best way to learn. Join over 10 million people and explore thousands of bite-size, interactive lessons that get you hand-on with core concepts in everything from from math and computer science to data analysis and physical science.

Brilliant‚Äôs team of award-winning teachers and researches build interactive lessons on so many STEM topics. Build math skills with intro to advanced courses covering algebra, geometry, calculus, probability and statistics, trigonometry, linear algebra, and more. Explore cutting-edge topics like AI, neural networks, algorithms, python, quantum mechanics, and beyond. Whatever math, data, computer science, or science topic you‚Äôre looking to skill up in‚ÄîBrilliant‚Äôs got you covered. 

**BRILLIANT IS THE BEST WAY TO LEARN**

- EFFECTIVE, HANDS-ON LEARNING

Visual, interactive lessons make concepts feel intuitive ‚Äî so even complex ideas just click. Our real-time feedback and simple explanations make learning efficient. Research shows that interactive learning is 6x more effective than watching lecture videos.

- GUIDED BITE-SIZE LESSONS

Brilliant makes it easy to stay on track, see your progress, and level up in as little as 15 minutes a day by building your problem solving skills one concept at a time.

- LEARN AT YOUR LEVEL

Professionals, students, and lifelong learners alike can hone dormant skills or learn new ones. Progress through lessons and challenges tailored to your level. Explore intro to advanced courses in algebra, geometry, calculus, logic, statistics and probability, scientific thinking, physics, quantum mechanics, AI, neural networks, algorithms, python, and beyond.

- STAY MOTIVATED

Form a real learning habit with fun content that‚Äôs always well-paced, game-like progress tracking, and friendly reminders.

**What are people saying about Brilliant?**

‚ÄúBrilliant has taught me mathematical concepts that I previously struggled to understand. I now feel confident approaching both technical job interviews and real world problem solving situations.‚Äù ‚ÄîJacob S.

‚ÄúI am using this app while taking CS classes and it often does a better job at explaining concepts than my professors.‚Äù ‚Äî Erald C.

‚ÄúWell-organized, well-explained, well-designed. Brilliant is absolutely a good choice if you want to learn or relearn anything objective.‚Äù - Joel M.

Send feedback to android@brilliant.org.

VISIT US: https://brilliant.org

summary: Master concepts in math, data, and computer science with bite-size lessons.

scraped_reviews.content: Really fun way to learn things! With the app, you get two lessons a day for free, unless you'd like to upgrade to unlimited. I've been learning scientific thinking, and it's helped me learn some basics of stuff all over that I wouldn't have thought to learn about. It's presented in an easy to understand way, and it's all interactive - which is a must for me. If I had the money, I would honestly pay for the subscription, but for now I've actually been pretty satisfied with just two lessons a day.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So glad you're enjoying learning with Brilliant! We love hearing that the interactive format and daily free lessons are helping you explore scientific thinking in new ways. Thanks for sharing your experience ‚Äî we hope you keep discovering and staying curious every day!

scraped_reviews.content: I am truly addicted to this app. I understand that this is an educational app, but I cannot go a day without it. Those first couple of days were so intoxicating as you were rewarded after every lesson, you were given points to compete against others, & you were gifted the ever addicting, "streak." Now, even after 7 months, I get a little rush from the ring after completing each lesson, as if I were a pavlovian mutt. However, there are days when I forget, but Koji is right there to reel me back.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: This absolutely made our day ‚Äî thank you! We love hearing how Brilliant keeps you engaged and energized to learn, and it‚Äôs awesome that Koji is helping you stay on track. Here‚Äôs to many more learning streaks, little dopamine boosts, and curiosity-fueled discoveries!

scraped_reviews.content: This app really makes learning fun! I picked it up mainly to relearn all the algebra I forgot in highschool so I could in turn learn more interesting subjects. the methods are very engaging and I feel like I'm learning more quickly than I did back in school and I'm having an easier time grasping the concepts. I've branched out into other topics the app covers and I'm having just as much fun with them too üòÅ
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We love hearing that Brilliant is making learning fun and engaging for you! üéâ It‚Äôs so rewarding to know that you‚Äôre not only refreshing your Algebra skills but also exploring new topics and enjoying the journey. Keep up the great work ‚Äî we‚Äôre excited to keep learning with you!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is engaging and the curricula for the courses I've used so far are usually very well-structured and helpful. I like how you can keep trying until you get the correct answer in the learning portion of the lesson, and I like how each lesson has a short quiz at the end. I would only recommend adding a general XP range for courses so that we can know if beginning a course will be both interesting and worth it for the leaderboards. I think it may also help in assessing the course complexity.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the thoughtful feedback! We're glad you're enjoying the structure and interactivity of the courses. Adding an XP range is an interesting idea ‚Äî we'll share it with the team as we continue improving the learning and leaderboard experience. Keep up the great work!

scraped_reviews.content: totally honest about subscription! I forgot to cancel the sub. happens a lot and figured I just lost out on another $30 or so. but no! Brilliant will refund you if you forget to cancel in a few days. I thought this was amazingly honest of them and they deserve the best reviews they can get. the app is great for kids to use. personally I'm at the point where I need more indepth and technical info, but it's still an amazing app and company!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We really appreciate your thoughtful review! We‚Äôre glad our support team could help and that you‚Äôve had a great experience with Brilliant. It‚Äôs wonderful to hear you enjoy the learning content ‚Äî we‚Äôll keep working to offer even deeper, more advanced material for curious minds like yours.

scraped_reviews.content: it works but to actually use the app you gotta wait 24 hours to do 2 courses and one is a warm up and the rest is behind a paywall of like 160 dollars a year or 25 dollars a month. which you can't really guarantee the value of the courses is equivalent to the amount you pay cuz you can't preview it. so if you're gonna only give 2 courses a day they should just be your choice instead of the current paywall track where once you set your level that's it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback ‚Äî we offer 2 free lessons daily to give learners a meaningful taste of our courses, and Premium unlocks full access. We understand you'd like more flexibility in what‚Äôs available to preview, and we‚Äôll share your suggestions with the team for review.

scraped_reviews.content: Currently on a 400+ day streak having used less than 10 streak charges. Completed several courses and have their yearly subscription and I feel it's worth it so long as you continue to do the courses and don't take the shortcut of maintaining streaks with practice lessons which are much shorter recaps. Useful when you don't have much time here and there but you want to be making progress
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Over 400 days ‚Äî that‚Äôs incredible! üéâ We're thrilled to hear you're finding real value in the courses and making consistent progress. Practice sessions are great for quick refreshers, but your commitment to deeper learning is inspiring. Keep going strong ‚Äî your curiosity is clearly paying off!

scraped_reviews.content: The courses are interesting and encourage thinking. There is a wide variety of introductory materials to learn from; however I was disappointed to see that some of the more intermediate math courses such as linear algebra are no longer available. I hope to see more analysis based mathematics courses that could build on the logic courses. It would also be nice to have more tools for reviewing material. Overall this app is a good way to get started in learning and practicing various topics.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the thoughtful feedback! We‚Äôre glad you're enjoying the variety and depth of our courses. We‚Äôll share your interest in more advanced math content and review tools with the team ‚Äî expanding learning paths is a big priority. Keep exploring and stay curious!

scraped_reviews.content: It's a cute app. It certainly won't help you "master" anything. The "courses" are very basic introductions to concepts. It is great in that regard. That said the subscription prices are way above where they should be. $5-$8/month would be a reasonable price. They also try to dupe you by giving quick practice challenges which use one of the two free keys you get daily. I think this is a poor practice.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your thoughts. Brilliant focuses on building strong intuition through interactive, concept-driven learning ‚Äî we know it's not a fit for every style. We‚Äôll pass along your pricing feedback, and if you‚Äôd like help exploring more advanced paths, feel free to reach out to support@brilliant.org.

scraped_reviews.content: Sometimes locks up, screen goes blank, and you have to relaunch and navigate all the way back through the lesson to get back to where you were. Subscription price is too high for what you get. Poor performance over cellular network, almost certainly from network activity on the UI thread. Good concept, but lessons and app implementation both need work. Advertised on basically every science and technology YouTube channel, but sadly the execution is very mid.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the thoughtful feedback ‚Äî we're sorry to hear about your experience. We're actively working to improve performance and lesson navigation. If you'd like to explore subscription options, our team at support@brilliant.org can help. Your insights are shared with our team.

scraped_reviews.content: pretty good, the lessons are rather quick and they build at a nice pace on top of each other. I really wish there was a chemistry lesson branch. But the sciences, math, and coding lessons will last me a good while. If you want to keep some of your brain in todays brainrot full world I recommend finding a youtube channel with a free trial and checking it out for a month.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the thoughtful review! We're glad you're enjoying the pacing and variety of topics. Chemistry is a great suggestion ‚Äî we‚Äôll share that with the team. And we love your mindset about staying sharp ‚Äî keep learning and stay curious!

scraped_reviews.content: reviewing the free version, statistics course. it's a good way to supplement a more traditional course. I like how it keeps you engaged with the material. with a limited number of activities provided per day, I wish the app were smart enough to forward me ahead to my current level of understanding. For example, if I answer every question about bar graphs correctly and quickly, I shouldn't be asked to review that material before progressing to the next lesson.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the thoughtful review. We're glad you're finding Brilliant a helpful supplement and enjoying the interactive approach. We appreciate your feedback on adaptive progression and will share it with the team as we continue refining the learning experience.

scraped_reviews.content: I LOVE Brilliant so far, it's fun and I'm learning. I love their teaching methods, it sticks to me instead of going from one ear and out the other, like other apps. The use of it is very easy and straightforward to figure out. Ads are minimal which I find very pleasing. If there were anything I would to change is the amount of Lessons you are given per day. The lessons make me want to engage more and make my curiosity spark. The most fastest way to progress is with premium, I do respect that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the love ‚Äî we're so glad Brilliant is helping concepts stick and sparking your curiosity! We hear your feedback on daily access limits and will share it with the team. Premium does unlock full access, but we're happy you're enjoying learning either way. Keep exploring!

scraped_reviews.content: I want to love this app. I really do. The concepts offered are genuinely interesting. But the teaching quality is SO shallow. There are no dictionaries for arbitrary jargon that appears randomly. Explanations don't explain the concept in depth, just how to solve the exercise. I had trouble with Mersenne primes and despite finishing the course, I still don't understand them. Certain exercise series are poorly designed and frustrating even if you do understand. So much potential, but falls short.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the honest feedback ‚Äî we‚Äôre glad the concepts resonate with you, and we‚Äôre sorry to hear the explanations didn‚Äôt go deep enough in some areas. We‚Äôll share your input with our team as we continue refining our courses to better support deeper understanding.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app for daily learning. They have a metric ton of different & interesting subject lessons. If I was in school these subjects may have bored me to tears, but the app makes learning these fun & easy. They have science, math, tech, programming, & more. Everything from the basics to advanced concepts. And the customer support tickets are handled immediately. The subscription price is worth it based on the quality of content & how much time I put into lessons.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre so happy Brilliant has helped turn these subjects into something fun and engaging! It‚Äôs great to hear you‚Äôre exploring a wide range of topics and finding value in the experience. Thanks for the kind words about our support team, too ‚Äî and happy learning ahead!

scraped_reviews.content: For how much this app is advertised you'd expect the free version to be less limited. You can do 1-2 exercises per day. If you're not premium you can't jump ahead in the lesson plan. I like the idea but the paywall is placed too close to the beginner experience. Also, way too many premium ads. Calm down. The cost for premium is way too high $25/mo is kinda dumb considering I can just youtube or ask jeeves about most of this info.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre glad you like the idea behind Brilliant and appreciate your thoughtful feedback on free access and pricing. The free plan is designed to offer a daily learning experience, while Premium unlocks full flexibility. We‚Äôll share your input with the team as we continue improving.

scraped_reviews.content: Of all the micro learning apps out there, this one is the best I've tried. It is evident that they work with pedagogists and educators, forming a great team with the designers that translate the concepts into app views and screens. Sadly I had to cancel because I was laid off, since it is on the pricier side :( but will go back as soon as I get a job :)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the kind and thoughtful words ‚Äî it means a lot to hear that our approach is resonating with you. We‚Äôre sorry to hear about your situation and truly hope to welcome you back when the time is right. Wishing you all the best on your next chapter!

scraped_reviews.content: Im a classic nerd: an electrical engineer, programmer and data analyst who is addicted to learning and consuming esoteric knowledge. That is to say, at first, I was skeptical about getting and subscribing to brilliant thinking that it would be too easy for me; and while I can solve the problems this has done something special, it built up my intuition, I am learning the math, reinforcing patterns at the most fundamental levels. Am I learning? yes! highly recommend for everyone at any level.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It‚Äôs wonderful to hear how Brilliant is helping you deepen intuition and reinforce fundamentals, even with your strong background! We love supporting learners who thrive on curiosity and exploration. Thanks for recommending us ‚Äî keep diving into new patterns and discoveries!

scraped_reviews.content: This math app Brilliant is great! Found it for my son so he can study some geometry on the go. I am using it as well. It is very user friendly, cool graphics, and thoroughly explains the why of each concept. They offer a free 30 day trial which is awesome so you can get acquainted with it before you pay a subscription.. We give it 5 stars!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for the wonderful review! We're thrilled Brilliant is supporting both you and your son in learning on the go. It‚Äôs great to hear you're enjoying the clear explanations, intuitive design, and trial experience. Keep exploring and learning together!

scraped_reviews.content: The app is GREAT and the lessons are HIGH QUALITY, but the monetization is EGREGIOUS. The subscription fee for unlocking premium is 13 dollars a month IF you pay annually, otherwise it's 20. Premium allows unlimited lessons a day, otherwise you get TWO. I really want to rate this app five stars, but I can't because premium is too expensive and free is too bad. Please, PLEASE, just force me to watch more ads and give me more daily lessons.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre so glad you‚Äôre enjoying Brilliant‚Äôs lessons and quality! We appreciate your thoughts on pricing and access. The annual plan offers the best value, and the free plan includes 2 daily lessons to keep learning. We‚Äôll share your feedback about ads and free access with our team.

scraped_reviews.content: Very quick lessons, but informative. It would help users more if the app didn't advance you before you fully understood the lesson. Also, you should bring back the lifetime subscription deal. I don't care to subscribe to monthly plans or annual renewals. But this app breaks down math lessons visually in a way that makes me excited to learn it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your thoughtful feedback! We‚Äôre glad Brilliant‚Äôs visual, engaging approach is making math exciting for you. We‚Äôll share your thoughts on pacing and lifetime plans with the team ‚Äî we truly appreciate your input as we continue improving the experience.

scraped_reviews.content: You guys are trash. This app used to be somewhat worth downloading, as you were able to access base level info of all subjects, and then pay a subscription if you want to get the rest. That made sense since all the ads I get for brilliant give the interpretation that anyone can access some base level info and brush up their knowledge. None of the ads disclose that you get one portion of one course per day. just say it like it is, this app is a textbook to buy in prep for a college course.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear you‚Äôre disappointed. Our ads reflect that Brilliant offers free daily access to interactive lessons, with Premium unlocking unlimited learning. We‚Äôll share your feedback about access and messaging with our team ‚Äî thank you for taking the time to share your perspective.

scraped_reviews.content: I paid for this app and I'm not sure there is a free version beyond a trial period, but I love this app regardless. I've been wanting to learn Python scripting for a while. This makes it easy by breaking it down into quick, bite sized lessons. I've also taken courses on AI and can't wait to explore what else I'll be able to learn.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre so glad you‚Äôre loving the app and diving into topics like Python and AI! Brilliant does offer a free plan with limited daily access, but we‚Äôre thrilled to hear you‚Äôve gone Premium and are enjoying the bite-sized lessons. Keep exploring ‚Äî there‚Äôs so much more ahead!

scraped_reviews.content: So don't get me wrong, I think the app itself is great, it has some good content and overall is well designed. What really annoys me though, is the constant reminders about premium. I know premium exists and I'll pay for it when/if I want to! Why do I need to be reminded every single day often multiple times!? If there's anything that will stop me using Brilliant, it's honestly the incessant reminders to spend money.. I really think it needs to be toned down a bit.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the honest feedback ‚Äî we‚Äôre glad you enjoy the app and content! We appreciate you pointing out the frustration with frequent Premium prompts. We've shared this with the team, as we're always looking to improve the experience for all learners.

scraped_reviews.content: I actually love this form of learning, I'm very much a hands-on person, and Brilliant is just my speed. Now, of course, to unlock unlimited use, you must fork over a little currency, but it's totally worth it. The lessons start out very simple and progress as you learn. I've chosen to pick up some more coding knowledge and expand my knowledge of electrical circuits, wouldn't you know? Brilliant just added a course for that very topic. Can I get a free year? please? üòç üôè
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So glad to hear Brilliant‚Äôs hands-on approach is the right fit for you ‚Äî and perfect timing with the new circuits course! While we can‚Äôt grant free access here, feel free to reach out to support@brilliant.org to check for any available discounts. Happy learning!

scraped_reviews.content: Meh. Leagues and streaks are not necessary or valuable. I'm not a fan of the Duolingo style system, so this app, sadly, feels like a bust for me. Very intriguing, but once I start playing with it, it's something to replace doomscrolling for the five minutes it takes to use up the two keys for the day. The math is meaningless if the student doesn't know what are the implied numbers.
